name: HoliRoots Pre-Wash Treatment Oil for Thinning Hair
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Oil
about: What it is: A pre-wash scalp and hair oil that strengthens roots, hydrates strands, promotes healthy hair growth and nurtures the scalp for a beautiful mane...Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Concerns:.- Dryness.- Thinning.- Damage/Split Ends/Breakage..Key Benefits:.- Strengthens roots and strands to help prevent breakage.- Promotes healthier hair growth.- Weightless hydration for scalp and hair..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Ashwagandha: A potent Ayurvedic root that strengthens roots and hair follicles.- Amla: An anxtioxidant-rich berry that hydrates and helps to control hair fall.- Plant Root Blend: A proprietary blend that is the ultimate remedy for calming the scalp..Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This multi-benefit pre-wash scalp oil helps promotes healthier hair growth, prevents breakage and provides weightless hydration. Infused with Ashwagandha, this lightweight oil is  for all hair types, including color-treated hair. Best used with a relaxing head massage for the perfect oil and om...Fragrance Description: A divine fresh, floral scent that blends Indian jasmine sambac, precious red champaca flowers and an unforgettably rich, warm base of cedarwood and tonka beans, transporting you to the divine city of Madurai in India...Clinical Results: In a consumer survey of 25 participants who tried HoliRoots Pre-wash Hair Treatment Oil over 2 weeks in January 2023:.- 96% said it has helped make their hair grow.- 92% said their scalp felt more nourished.- 96% noticed less hair breakage from brushing...Clean at Sephora.
ingredients: - Ashwagandha: A potent Ayurvedic root that strengthens roots and hair follicles.    .- Amla: An anxtioxidant-rich berry that hydrates and helps to control hair fall.    .- Plant Root Blend: A proprietary blend that is the ultimate remedy for calming the scalp.        ...Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Withania Somnifera Root Extract, Phyllanthus Emblica Fruit Extract, Bacopa Monnieri Leaf Extract, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Uraria Picta Root Extract, Tribulus Terrestris Root Extract, Stereospermum Suaveolens Root Extract, Solanum Xanthocarpum Root Extract, Solanum Indicum Root Extract, Premna Serratifolia Root Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Beta-Sitosterol, Gmelina Arborea Root Extract, Desmodium Gangeticum Root Extract, Aegle Marmelos Root Extract, Squalene, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Salicylate, Isoeugenol, Linalool....The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..- Section dry Hair and apply one dropper of pre-wash oil directly onto your scalp. .- Gently massage into your roots, focusing on the crown chakra. Inhale deeply and enjoy the grounding aroma..- Leave on for a minimum of five minutes, or overnight for the best results..- Rinse thoroughly before cleansing with shampoo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to finish my mini I bought months ago to be able to give an honest review. I used this hair oil for my dry scalp and I love it. I cant speak from thinning hair, but my hair strains are fine and is virgin blonde hair.  In comparison to the famous coconut oil from OGX or really coconut oil in general has never worked for my hair it just never agreed with it so I was tired of the hype and wanted to find something that would suit my hair. That is when I discovered Fable & Mane and my hair loves this!!! It helps my dry scalp so much. The smell is Devine it's not super intense in my opinion and rinsing it out is easy there is no greasy residue like coconut oil would do to my hair. I use this once a week before I shower ( I prefer not to sleep with oil in my hair). This in my honest and humble opinion is #1 for me and I just bought the full size!! Full transparency I don't expect this to be a magical bottle of oil to what a lot of people look for in an oil to fix hair concerns.  If you have thinning hair it is suggested to see a dermatologist. (:

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used an insane amount of scalp oils, but this is the one for me. YES you lose a little bit of hair at first. That's supposed to happen. After a month and a half of consistent use I lose 40-50% less hair then I used to before. My scalp feels great and clean. I also used to experience dry itchy scalp which has completely gone away with using this oil before I wash my hair. I use the oil once a week. Make sure you use a clarifying shampoo after to completely clean your scalp. if you're still greasy then YOU'RE USING TOO MUCH. I have long thin type hair. I leave it on my scalp for about 30 mins to an hour I don't sleep with it on. I recommend this scalp oil 100% Just use it properly for your hair type. And yes there is a strong scent, but bonus to me is I love it. if you don't like a strong scent maybe skip it.

reviews.review_title: Gentle Yet Effective for Fine Hair
reviews.review_text: After using it for a month, I can honestly say it doesnu2019t work like a miracle product, but it definitely makes a noticeable difference. The oil has a pleasant texture and isn't too heavy, which is perfect for my fine hair. Plus, it offers great value for the price, so I feel itu2019s worth it for the gentle nourishment it provides. Overall, itu2019s a solid option for those with fine hair looking to add a little extra strength without weighing it down.

reviews.review_title: Nourished Roots, Radiant Results: A Five-Star Must
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This pre-wash hair treatment oil from Fable & Mane is an absolute game-changer! From the moment I applied it to my hair, I could feel the luxurious blend of botanical oils working their magic. The lightweight yet deeply nourishing formula effortlessly penetrated my strands, leaving them feeling incredibly soft, smooth, and revitalized.I was pleasantly surprised by how versatile this treatment oil is u2013 not only did it help to strengthen and protect my hair from damage, but it also added a beautiful shine that lasted throughout the day. The earthy, aromatic scent instantly transported me to a serene forest, creating a truly indulgent experience every time I used it.One of the best parts about this product is its versatility. Whether used as a pre-wash treatment, an overnight mask, or even as a leave-in conditioner for extra hydration, it never fails to deliver exceptional results. I've included a picture of my hair after using this treatment oil, and as you can see, it looks healthier, shinier, and more vibrant than ever before.Overall, I can't recommend this product enough to anyone looking to achieve luscious, nourished locks. It's become an essential part of my hair care routine, and I'm thrilled with the results. Treat yourself to the HoliRoots Pre-Wash Hair Treatment Oil u2013 your hair will thank you!

Infused with powerful botanicals like Ashwagandha and Bhringraj, it nourishes and strengthens hair from root to tip. Its lightweight formula absorbs effortlessly, leaving hair soft, shiny, and manageable. Whether you're battling dryness or seeking to revitalize your strands, this treatment oil is a must-have for any hair care ritual.

I've got dry hair that's not too thin but definitely not thick. I've been using this the night before shampooing, but I'll also be using it before my showers, as well, since it's not necessary to use it overnight. It definitely makes my hair feel super soft, and it feels overall more manageable. It looks nicer, too - much shinier! I love it so much! This will be a product that I'll be sad when it's empty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried out the HoliRoots Pre-wash Hair Treatment Oil from Fable & Mane. I have long, straight, fine hair that always gets oily roots fast, also flakiness and buildup.   This oil was fairly easy to apply. It is very thin thigh and you have to be careful not to accidentally drip it somewhere you donu2019t want. It kind of comes out of the dropper by itself.   I just parted by hair in a few sections and then rubbed it in with my fingers. At the end I also combed my hair to spread it more evenly.   After an hour I rinsed it with water in the shower. Then I washed my hair with shampoo.   To my surprise my hair didnu2019t end up looking greasy after it was dried. I had the feeling that my scalp really liked this treatment. I didnu2019t have the amount of flakes I usually get. Also my hair seemed to have more volume at the roots. The scent was pleasant. Kind of between floral and herbal.   I will be using this hair oil until it is gone. Possibly also getting more after that.

reviews.review_text: I was really impressed with Fable & Maneu2019s HoliRoots Pre-wash Hair Treatment Oil. So, Iu2019m always on the lookout for a great hair oil. Just drop some oil onto your scalp and massage into roots and hair. It smells insanely good and I can already tell the difference in the health of my hair. Itu2019s smoother, shinier, and seems all-around more healthy. The breakage has diminished somewhat as well. Iu2019m excited to see what continued use does!

reviews.review_title: A new staple in my haircare routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted the Fable & Mane HoliRoots Pre-Wash Hair Oil in exchange for my honest review.   I have slightly wavy, medium-thick hair that I think is a 2b hair type.  Recently, I have felt like my hair has been looking dull and lifeless.   I order to counteract this, I have gotten really into hair care, and oiling my hair pre-wash has been a big part of that.  I normally just use a rosemary oil, but the Fable Mane HoliRoots Pre-Wash Hair oil sounded really interesting to me.   This oil contains Ashwagandha and Dashmool, which are supposed to strengthen and restore your hair.    The instructions say to apply one dropper to your roots and hair and to massage it.  I have read that massaging it in is the key to healthy hair.  I then leave it in for at least 5 minutes, but I have left it in for a few hours.  After I wash my hair, my hair feels super softer and is much more shiny.  I have even been asked what I am doing differently with my hair, since it looks so nice.  I am not sure if my hair seems stronger, but I am sure I need to continue using this product to see the long-term benefits.  However, I am definitely pleased with the short-term benefits and will continue to use this product.

reviews.review_text: As a new mom battling post-pregnancy hair loss and tons of dandruff/dryness, I've been on a quest to find products that can help revive my hair. Ashwagandha is known for its rejuvenating properties, and I can attest to its effectiveness. Since using this treatment oil, I've noticed a  reduction in hair fall, less build up, and my hair feels stronger and more resilient.  I apply this treatment oil generously to my scalp and hair before washing, allowing it to penetrate and nourish my strands. The oil is lightweight and doesn't weigh down my hair. After washing, my hair feels incredibly soft, and I've even noticed  some new growth in areas where my hair was thinning, hello baby hairs!!!  The soothing aroma of this treatment oil is also a plus. I recently tried the Fable and Mane pre-wash hair treatment and I have to say, I'm impressed. This product claims to nourish and strengthen your hair before you shampoo, and it definitely lives up to its promises. The first thing I noticed about this treatment is the amazing scent. It has a beautiful, natural fragrance that lingers in your hair long after you've rinsed it out. The scent alone is enough to make me want to use this product again and again. The consistency of the treatment is also great. It's not too thick or heavy, so it spreads easily through the hair without leaving any residue. I applied it to my damp hair and left it on for about 10 minutes before shampooing as directed. After rinsing out the treatment and shampooing my hair, I immediately noticed a difference in the texture. My hair felt incredibly soft and smooth, and it looked shiny and healthy. I also noticed that my hair was easier to detangle and style, which is a huge plus for someone like me who has thick and unruly hair. I've been using this pre-wash treatment for a few weeks now, and I can honestly say that my hair has never looked better. It feels stronger, looks shinier, and is overall much healthier. I also love that this product is made with natural and organic ingredients, so I feel good about using it regularly. I highly recommend the Fable and Mane pre-wash hair treatment. It's a luxurious and effective product that delivers on its promises. If you're looking to improve the health and appearance of your hair, give this treatment a try. You won't be disappointed.

reviews.review_title: The hair loss reviews are no joke
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing but please do not ignore other reviews warning of hair loss. I read the reviews prior to purchasing--a majority of them were great but I did notice several people commenting how it made their hair fall out. My hair is quite healthy and resilient so I generally ignore those reviews as I've never had that happen to me with any hair product. I used it exactly as directed  on the bottle and I was so alarmed at the amount of hair I lost from this product when washing my hair. Hair fall while shampooing & conditioning is normal for me especially as I detangle, but I was alarmed that it looked like I was taking extensions out of my hair in the shower. My hair was coming out in chunks. The instructions advise to leave it on overnight, which is what I did but after all that hair fall I decided to give it another chance by leaving it on for a lesser amount of time. I unfortunately still had the same results with my hair falling out. My hair did feel pretty soft once it was dry but the amount of hair I lost is not worth that at all. I gave it 3 tries to give it a fair chance but ended up returning this.

There are way better options out there in terms of hair oils that do not have any preservatives or chemical perfumes. Second time I used it was as an overnight treatment and only one dropper massaged through my scalp and combed thoroughly, top loose bun and showered in the morning. Iu2019ve used so many oils and they work beautifully but none work like this. This oil is a stand out product for my particular hair and scalp health.   Not sure how this will go long term, but so far I love how my brushes glide through my hair, my hair feels smoother, hydrated and not greasy. I will for sure repurchase this product.   My only critique is that they should omit artificial or added fragrance from their ingredients. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this for a couple of weeks now and finally have it figured out. I think the biggest problem people have with the smell, dandruff etc is that they are using way way way too much.   I read an article with the founders of the company and it made the instructions make more sense to me.   You are only supposed to use a few drops! And then spread it on your fingertips and massage it into your scalp.   This product is VERY different from other hair oils. It's just for your scalp/roots and only before washing. The smell isnu2019t overpowering AT ALL when you donu2019t use too much.   I use this on myself, my husband and my daughters! It's amazing and all of our hair has gotten much softer, fuller, lighter, healthier, shinier since using.   (For reviews that talk about dandruff... dandruff is caused by excess oil, not dry skinu2026 so if youu2019re slathering tons of this on your scalp it definitely could cause it. But that isnu2019t the correct way to use it)  I really love this product. It makes my hair so soft and manageable. I have noticed less have less fall out

reviews.review_title: You need to walk in knowing what to expect....
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a faithful customer of Sephora for about 13 years now, and I love trying new products.  Why I haven't written a review on the thousands of products I have tried is beyond me, but I plan to start now because there is so much to share!  So, there is no transformative hair product out there.  Really, you need trial and error (and time) to see if something is working for you or not.  The number one issue I find with hair oil is that a lot of people who are using it may not actually need it (or their expectation is that they will wake up with Pantene ProV hair).    This pre-wash hair oil is for someone who has noted hair loss/shedding due to dry hair that is breaking easily, or someone who is experiencing more dry-itchy scalp and is potentially causing hair loss from all of the itching/scratching.    I live in very dry, cold conditions during the winter months.  Classically I start to notice more hair fall and breakage once November hits, and it'll progress through until late March or so.  I have wavy/curly hair and it is thin.  I find that using this oil once/week, along with a hydrating shampoo/conditioner, is leading to less hair loss and breakage.  My scalp is no longer itchy, and in-turn I am scratching far less.  How to use: I don't leave anything on overnight as I find it can clog up hair follicles and cause irritation/folliculitis.  I would advise putting this on after work on an evening when you have no commitments, and leaving it on for about 3-4 hours before washing.  Of course you can do this during the morning/day as well on a weekend.  Do not tie your hair up or braid it etc; the stress on the hair follicle along with the oil will make it more prone to fall-out.  I think if used right, and for the right purposes, this is one of my most favourite hair oils of all time.
After using the oil for the first time my hair feels very smooth and the frizz is gone.

reviews.review_title: Quality ingredients - a little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy that this oil is not horrible smelling, tacky or thick - makes it so simple to get a a few drops to massage into the scalp without issue. I love my Indian hair ritual results but am not keen on the sticky and pungent smelling mixtures. Eventhough so many ingredients are staple Indian hair and skincare herbs, I can use this oil to keep it all in my hair routine without the assault to my senses! I usually leave oils in my hair overnight before washing the next day and it's a whole ordeal making sure your skin and bedding isn't smelling of oil. This oil almost vanishes after application, so it doesn't feel like you're over-applying it to your head.  I can see how my hair feels much lighter and fluffier after washing now - it has the same bouncy and thick feeling at the scalp I used to have when my hair was a very short bob. I never thought I would get that vitality back to my hair after growing it out for so many years now.  As a bonus, because I love how my hair looks and feels after washing again after being worried my hair feels limp and dry for so long despite my trusted Indian oil routines. I am now taking even better care of my hair between washes, and braver to try new hair wash products to elevate my hair wash experience as I am confident in how this oil nourishes my scalp and hair. As a side note: tested out both this Holi Roots pre-wash oil and the JVN hair oil sample sizes, and honestly with identical experiences and results, I am happy to keep them both as my only pre wash oils now to use on alternating washes, and won't be going back to the oil fashioned Indian oils!

reviews.review_title: I was skeptical but itu2019s now a holy grail product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually bought this because of Jamie Paige from yt LOL. I was super skeptical in the beginning because Iu2019ve always had issues with my scalp and other pre-washes Iu2019ve used, while they worked initially, ended up not doing anything long term for me.   Iu2019ve been using this since the beginning of August and omg my scalp has never been/looked healthier?! I could tell after my day 2 hair that my scalp was hydrated and not dry and starting to flake. And I can actually go a full week now without having to wash my hair (I have super long, curly textured Asian hair).   I use it as an overnight treatment and put my hair up in a loose bun. I definitely recommend leaving it in longer than the minimum 5 minutes, I just feel it penetrates the scalp better if you do.   Iu2019m not sure why there are comments saying it didnu2019t help with hair growthu2026no where in the description does it claim to help with that. The main purpose is to help with dryness and damaged hair. Keep that in mind before purchasing this.  Oh. It smells great too, so thatu2019s definitely a plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a Sephora employee and did receive this product for training purposes.   I have fine, thinning hair and am always looking for something to strengthen the hair and add volume and this product did both.   I was skeptical at first as having fine, thinning hair always means any oil or product that makes the hair look greasy or weighed down is never a good thing. However this product advertises as a scalp treatment to promote stronger, healthier hair so I decided to try it.   I emptied a full pipette into the scalp and ran the excess through my hair and left on for 15 minutes before shampooing out.   I am very happy with the results after just one use. Immediately out of the shower and towel drying my hair I noticed right away that my hair was already more voluminous. I could immediately tell in the front that my hair already had a lot more volume and body. I traditionally have to do a lot of u201cfluffingu201d to my hair in tandem with products to add volume and today I just let my hair air dry.   Itu2019s got a lot of body, volume, and feels incredibly smooth and healthy. Will definitely continue to incorporate this product into my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for about 2 weeks now and have already started to notice a decrease in shedding. Fantastic product so far - only complain is that the eyedropper is really long but the amount it can suck up is fairly small, wish it would fill the eyedropper because that would be enough product.

reviews.review_text: The reason for my rating is simply because of the inclusion of parfum (fragrance) in their ingredients - especially so high on the list which means there is significantly more of it than the other ingredients. Artificial fragrance is unhealthy and harmful and there's no reason at all to include this, especially for something that's supposed to be helping the health of your hair. I don't seem to be able to add a review on their official website but I hope the creators read these reviews and consider removing this ingredient.

reviews.review_title: My hair just loves this oil!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This brand is the reason I can let my thick wavy/curly (2b/c) hair air-dry and it looks luxurious and healthy (after years of blowdrying damage). It's now shiner, smoother and feels and smells great. I tried this oil first (nothing like it on the market) and then slowly worked my way through the other products. Love this the most, though was pleasantly surprized by the shampoo/conditioner/mask as well since I'm very picky and my hair has a mind of it's own! :) It works best left in overnight but even left in for a few hours works pretty well.  The oil washes out very easily. My hair and scalp feel amazing, healthy.  The scent is a bit strong, but I don't mind given the benefits. I also appreciate that the brand is helping save tigers and you get to feel like you're contributing a bit.

It took awhile to wash out as well and I didnu2019t see any results from it even after giving it a chance for a month. Iu2019ve managed to find another use for it - to take down the frizz on my ends and I actually use it as a body oil over my tattoos, it makes the gleam in the best way. That being said this is only because I enjoy the smell, if you donu2019t or are sensitive to fragrance then I definitely wouldnu2019t recommend this to you.

I wanted to love this after reading all the good reviews but my hair started falling out like crazy right after using this. It has definitely improved my overall hair health. For reference I use this oil, shu uemara cleansing hair oil purchased through Sephora and shu uemara hair oil and holy moly. reviews.review_text: This product is literal magic in a bottle! I've been using it on my roots after a harsh bleach job gone wrong and my hair feels fresh and new again! I can't thank this brand enough for creating something so awesome!  Anything that can help me get over that much bleach damage is a win in my book. The results were very fast and I only had to use it a few times to notice a significant difference! Thanks to this magic little bottle I love my hair again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had not heard of this brand before trying this product and I had never used a pretreatment oil. I like the scent of this product and it helps my hair in this drying cold air. I would repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this stuff! It makes me hair feel amazing and itu2019s so easy to use and apply!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product!  I have really thin and greasy hair, so I leave this product in overnight then wash it out the next day. My hair is so soft and shiny afterwards! My hair feels like rabbit fur! I also really enjoy the smell,  I feel like I'm at a spa when I use it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is truly amazing!! It has really helped my dry winter scalp and stopped so much flaking. My only gripe is the smell. Even after washing out, the smell lingers and I donu2019t care for the scent.   Thanks Influenster for this gifted product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item for free from Influenster and Fable & Mane in exchange for my honest review. I really loved it and it smells absolutely divine without being overpowering. I only used it as a short 5 minute pre-shampoo treatment & am anxious now to try it out overnight. My hair & scalp felt very clean & healthy & no scalp irritation which Iu2019ve been battling lately. Iu2019m praying that with the included ingredients (like Castor Oil) that it might help my hair loss issues long term. It also has adorable packaging & I love the glass bottle as it looks pretty on my counter. I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Been wanting to get this and finally pushed myself and I love it. It smells fantastic and is so smooth. Doesnu2019t make my hair super oily or anything. This is a lightweight. Iu2019m Honestly so glad I added this to my collection. Will definitely purchase again and again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to get this but I was sadly disappointed. It has a lovely smell but it left my roots crunchy and feeling like straw. It didnu2019t make a difference what shampoo I used after, it was the same feeling. I wouldnu2019t recommend this personally, but I am sure it works well for others.

reviews.review_title: Best Smelling and Nourishing Scalp Oil
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Recently, I have been using the HoliRoots Pre-wash treatment oil by Fable & Mane. I apply a dropper full of oil to my scalp in sections and then massage it in. I also run the oil through the mid-lengths and ends of my hair to seal the cuticle. I noticed that doing this helped  smooth my hair when it air dried. After applying, I wait about 5 minutes before I rinse the product out and proceed with my usual shower routine. My favorite part about the pre-wash treatment is the fragrance blend u2014 which has top notes of almond, middle notes of Indian jasmine, and base notes of patchouli and neroli. I like that this product is 100% vegan and cruelty-free. I definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't tell if this is effective or not because I have to wash it out immediately. and a 2nd /3rd washing. The scent is entirely too strong. I smell like fake vanilla coconut and I'm immediately transported back to HS. I can't remove the smell after washing. It's way too overpowering and if you wear a fragrance, it will overpower it. I'd like to like this, but it's too much. I will recommend the product, as I'm sure it's great for some, but if you want less fragrance, this is not for you

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary sample of Fable and Mane HoliRoots Hair Oil from Influestner. The product comes packaged in a brown glass bottle with a dropper and clear labeling. The formula contains Ashwagandha and Dashmool which improves our roots for healthier hair. I applied one dropper of the Pre-Wash Oil onto my roots and throughout my hair leaving it in until the next morning. It has a subtle earthy scent. In the morning I washed my hair and style as usual. I used HoliRoots Hair Oil twice a week for 4 weeks. I noticed my hair is softer, stronger,  and not as frizzy.  But my scalp was dry and itchy from leaving it overnight. I suggest using the product 5 minutes before shampooing. The Oil can be used on all hair types. The formula is Cruelty Free, Vegan, and Silicone Free.  @fableandmane @influesnter @reesetisha #FableandMane #HoliRoots #Influenster #Reesetishas2cents #reesetisha #holirootsreviews

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It feels so good and tingly on my scalp! It also makes my scalp feel nourished and more comfortable. Iu2019m curious to see the long-term results of using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg the amount of perfume in this is insane. I shouldu2019ve read the ingredients carefully. Not worth the price . All the good ingredients are pretty much at the end of the list so not much quality

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, I love this hair oil! It smells great and after I massage it onto my scalp I can feel a slight tingling sensation. I like to put it in before bed as a leave in treatment. I have bad dandruff and I have noticed that this oil helps improve my dandruff. Overall, I would recommend! I canu2019t wait to see how this oil changes the hair that grows in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells great and is super hydrating!  Easy to apply, not sticky at all.  Makes my hair soft and scalp feel hydrated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is was great to apply and keep on overnight.  After a morning shower, my hair felt softer and looked smoother. My favorite thing about this product is the scent!! wow! I also like applying this to my ends after styling as a finisher for smooth, hydrated ends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm always leary about pre-wash treatments for fear that they will leave my hair oily or flat. This one exceeded all expectations! I felt a difference not only in my scalp, but my hair too! It left them both moisturized and my hair bouncy. The smell was AMAZING!!!! This bottle is going to last a LONG time, but when it's gone, I am going to need more!

reviews.review_title: I'd Recommend Based On Scent Alone!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, I love this product for scent alone! I want a fragrance that smells like this! That being said, I haven't used this for as long as I think I'd need to see true results, but thus far it seems to work nicely. My hair is softer and smoother than it usually tends to be, and while I am doing a few things to reduce the dryness and breakage of my hair, this seems to be getting it back to a good place more quickly than when I don't use Fable & Mane. I'd definitely recommend giving this a try! At the very least, it smells incredible!

reviews.review_title: THIS OIL CURED MY DRY FLAKEY SCALP!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hair treatment oil has helpedy scalp so much. I've suffered with dry flakey patches on my scalp due to stress and sensitivity. This oil has basically cured it and is no longer dry or flakey. It also leaves my hair silly soft and doesn't build up oilliness. Also a little bit product is all you need so it will last a while too. The subtle scent is amazing and natural smelling and is overwhelming or irritating. I recommend this oil to anyone with scalp issues. I received this product complimentary from Influencer for reviewing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beneath my current hair color, I am a level 11 bleached hair 4+ years. My hair did not feel stronger with this product per say, but it did add hydration and felt much smoother! Considering my hair cuticles are pretty much non existent, cannot speak on behalf of mending the hair. I just wish the product had a lighter fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item free from Influenster. This great product has given a lot of shine to my curly hair, I have been applying it at night one day before washing my hair and I feel that my hair is soft and manageable. Plus the scent it has is very relaxing. I recommend it, it is a great treatment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t say that this oil works somehow transformative on my hair, but itu2019s truly nice for cold season extra hydration. Iu2019ve been using this oil ones a week overnight and washing my hair next day in the morning. It has very pleasant scent and itu2019s easy to apply. Iu2019m usually applying it all over the roots and over the dry ends, massage my hair for at least five minutes  and then making a bun. That way itu2019s not transfer on my pillow. This hair oil is easy to wash out, so you donu2019t need to do double washing. My hair looks quite healthy and it feels like this oil is helping to keep my end from drying and splitting. Overall I have pleasant experience using HoliRoots prewash hair treatment oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this for a couple weeks now. I notice my hair has definitely gotten somewhat stronger with less breakage and helping the dry split ends heal slowly but surely. When the package reads to use 1 dropper full I was unable to fill the dropper completely full as it only filled 1/4 of the way. Moisturizes dry locks, and is super easy to wash out the next day. I thought with it being an oil it'd be hard to get out the next morning but found it was easier than I thought it'd be. I received complimentary from Influenster for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: For some reason I anticipated this to smell worse than it did. I didnu2019t see a huge difference with this but didnu2019t hate it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m Indian so I might be biasedu2014this oil feels like a ritual! Super soft, lovely rich fragrance. Did wonders for my scalp. I left it on for a couple hours myself!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I got this oil I was hoping that it will help my hair stop falling. It is so easy to apply,  the smell is super good, the oil is not thick so itu2019s so easy to wash your hair after applying it. To be honest I didnu2019t use it that much to say if itu2019s good for falling hair or not but I didnu2019t realize any difference in my hair, it  still falling.. a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My head sometimes feels a bit itchy and dry after coloring my hair. This oil is helpful in soothing my scalp, and it smells nice! I also like that the dropper is easy to use. It doesnu2019t easily leak like many oil dropper products, which makes it much simpler to apply small amounts.

reviews.review_title: I lost so much hair and HoliRoots brought it back!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had recently suffered with hair loss over the pandemic and was completely freaking out. I dont know which part of my routine caused the new hair growth (HoliRoots, collagen powder and a hair vitamin), but I did use the HoliRoots before washing my hair, 3 times a week. I have baby hairs all over the place and all my balding spots, my widening middle part, they're all filled with hair again!  I cannot reccommend this enough to anyone suffering from hair loss! 10/10!! FYI - not sponsored, im not an influencer, just an honest review because I know what its like to go through this and not have any real, honest answers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: **I RECEIVED THIS FREE FROM INFLUENSTER AS AN EXCHANGE FOR AN HONEST REVIEW ** Great product, I already see the results. Will keep buying! Def recommend it for those girls who want to grow their hair out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from Influenster to try out and wanted to try it out for a few weeks before I reviewed it. I used every night before I knew I was going to wash my hair the next morning. Itu2019s definitely not something I could leave in my hair all day cuz my hair felt oily if I left it in too long. However itu2019s not meant to be left in all day. It feels very nice putting it in, you just apply it at your hair line so your scalp could benefit from it as well. My hair felt very good after just a week of using this, easier to manage and it felt nice and strong. I bleach my hair every few weeks so my hair can feel overworked at times but using this along with my other serums really seemed to help my hair. My hairdresser commented that my hair felt very soft and healthy which is always nice to hear. I definitely would recommend this. Want to try out some other products from this line soon. Will be checking them out. Will rebuy this too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm SO happy that I was able to try this product!  Not only did it cure & calm my incredibly dry scalp, but it left my hair extra soft & shiny!  This oil will definitely now be a part of my regular routine!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a lovely oil and if someone told me that this was a facial oil, instead of hair oil, Iu2019d believe them.   Itu2019s light, absorbs easily and doesnu2019t make my hair & scalp oily that I could even wear this during the day (though Iu2019ve only done this with my hair up in a bum). It softens my hair and makes it look shiny and not greasy.   I canu2019t attest to its strengthening abilities, because, while my 2b/2c wavy hair is dry and frizzy, itu2019s thick, strong, grows fast, and Iu2019ve never had issues with breakage or split ends.   I canu2019t quite make out the fragrance, but itu2019s light and smells warm, vaguely like vanilla/chocolate/coffee but without the cloying sweetness. I donu2019t get spicy floral at all. As someone with a sensitive nose who doesnu2019t wear perfume and doesnu2019t like scented skincare & makeup, I found it unobtrusive and quite pleasant.   My only gripe is the dropper bottle. It drips so thereu2019s no way to control the drops so itu2019s a bit messy to apply. Also, the direction says to use at least one dropper of oil, but the dropper only draws about 1/4 full, so I canu2019t tell if that means a full dropper full (4x) or 1/4 dropper full.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been enjoying this product. My scalp has been a little more dry then normal and this seems to be helping!!! My dropper doesn't suck up a full amount so I have to use it a few times to be able to cover my head. I want to try it overnight like it suggests!! Highly recommend if you have some dry hair or scalp issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was incredible. I felt instant results and my curls were looking so hydrated!!! I decided to try this because i was really struggling with having hydrated hair especially as the days become colder. My hair reacts angry to the cold. Leaving this oil on overnight revitalized my hair. I make sure to use it sparingly and not too often because Iu2019m afraid of build up. Anyways, great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: SO GOOD! Such a wonderful mix of oils. Iu2019ve only been using it for a few weeks now but Iu2019ve already noticed some baby hairs crop up at my hairline- coincidence? I think not! Given that these are some heavy duty oils, Iu2019m surprised it smells as good as it does. The formula has a very pleasant light rose smell. Itu2019s not a heavy formula and washes out nicely after application with a good shampoo, but the scent still lingers faintly. Iu2019ve tried a lot of different hair oils and serums and I really recommend this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed using this product. I saw an improvement in breakage, frizz, and thinning hair. It is a very nourishing and hydrating serum that improves scalp health and strengthens hair follicles. I even saw growth in places that have been bald forever. The scent wasnu2019t overbearing or unpleasant in anyway. Overall it is a very nice product to add to your self care routine.

reviews.review_title: It did not change my hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly think this did nothng for my hair. My hair is definitely on the dry side from overprocessing. If you use this oil, be sure to take a shower the same day or next morning (it says best results are to leave it overnight). The oil is super thick and will make your hair feel greasy when you put it on. I did not notice a change in my hair and I did leave it in for a couple of hours each time. Maybe I just wasn't compatible. At least the packaging and the dropper worked well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. My hair does feel stronger and it didnu2019t make my hair oily after washing like I was thinking it might. Also the packaging is so beautiful, I donu2019t mind keeping it out on my counter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After receiving the sample of Fable & Mane HoliRoots Hair Treatment Oil from Influenster I was a little skeptical as I have relatively fine hair and in the past hair / scalp oils have left my hair greasy looking even after washing it out however, with this product I did not have this problem. I left it on overnight as a scalp treatment and when I washed it out in the morning my hair looked amazing and my scalp felt hydrated. I would recommend this product to others and would most definitely purchase again. Although I havenu2019t been using this product very long I am looking forward to seeing continued results in my hair quality!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best smelling hair care that I have ever used. The product itself is very moisturizing and feels luxurious. It made my hair smooth, shiny and felt healthy after using. I have fine hair and it didnu2019t weigh it down. I will continue to use this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed using this oil. I took down my braids and needed to give my hair a good wash. There was a subtle scent. I like the applicator because I could apply it straight to my scalp.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Immediate results! I parted my hair to apply a full dropper twice throughout and massaged it into my scalp and hair. Even though I only left it in for about 10 mins, my hair was soft, shiny, and more manageable after showering. The oil also helped with dryness and split ends, making my long dry hair look and feel much healthier. I think it even helped bring out my natural waves thanks to the hydration. Love that itu2019s vegan and silicone free. I enjoyed the scent, itu2019s not overpowering and doesnu2019t linger after washing hair. Iu2019m excited to see the results after finishing one bottle so minus one star until then. But so far I would recommend and repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for almost a month, and love how it makes hair shiny, healthy and silky. I normally use coconut oil once a week as a Pre-wash treatment, after trying this, I will no longer use coconut oil. I have long, thick coarse, Pacific Islander hair, this product helped to tame my hair when straightened, making it look smooth and shiny, and when curly, it helped make my curls not as frizzy. I usually do an overnight treatment and will saturate my hair in the oil, put it in a bun and put a shower cap over it overnight, with a towel on my pillow. When I wake up in the morning, it easily rinses out with shampoo, sometimes I use a deep conditioner on the ends, but usually the oil is enough of a condioner treatment.  It leaves my hair with a light scent, that is not overpowering. This also helps to moisturize my scalp since I use a lot of heating tools on my hair. I will be buying this and will continue to be a part of my weekly hair routine to help my hair look itu2019s best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Life changing!! My hair used to be so coarse and  dry.  I have been trying to grow it from years now itu2019s finally long and healthy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the smell of this and the idea behind the product, but it really just didnu2019t do much for me. I have a very dry, flaky scalp in the winter months and thought this would help but it didnu2019t.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for a few weeks now and I feel like the amount of hair that falls out daily is lessening. I use it before I shower and it has an amazing smell. Washes out well with no lingering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair felt smoother and healthier after using this product! Itu2019s easy to apply at my roots. I let it sit a couple of hours before I washed my hair. My hair felt thicker, healthier and more smooth.

I received this product as part of an influenster campaign

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This oil is lightweight and hydrating. I put it on before bed when I know Iu2019m going to wash my hair the next day. It may take longer for me to see results as I have bleached hair with some damage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it, but I donu2019t love it. My hair gets a little greasy from this product, and I havenu2019t noticed any growth or strength, but does help soften it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s hard to tell exactly how well itu2019s working. I feel like it can take a couple months to see significant growing results. Which is why i gave it 4 stars. Iu2019m really looking forward to see how it works in the coming months for growth!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product, itu2019s definitely not my favorite though. For the price I donu2019t think I will continue to use it.
