I have seen others complain about how greasy their hair gets even after shampooing but that hasnu2019t happened for me. I usually leave the product on for a few hours before I shower then wash out. I havenu2019t noticed even noticed an added shine to my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my hair feel super soft from medium to ends. My scalp is oily and the oil leaves it even more greasy, I would not recommend applying it to an oily scalp.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this oil after a hiatus from hair oils following the realization that the OGX Morracan Argan Oil I was using had dimethicone and caused silicone build-up. This oil made my hair significantly less oily than that one! I also loved that a little goes a long way and it doesn't feel greasy in my hair after application. Even after only leaving it in my hair for around 15 minutes before showering, my hair felt stronger and my scalp felt hydrated after only using shampoo (no conditioner) to wash it out. I'm excited to see how it will strengthen my hair after extended use! The fragrance is a little strong but it goes away pretty quickly. Overall, would definitely recommend to those who are looking for a new hair oil that doesn't leave your hair greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed using this product. Followed the instructions and I appreciated how it did help hydrate my scalp. Itu2019s perfect for these coming winter months! Definitely will be using this in my hair care routine. I did receive this item as complimentary.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product if youu2019re trying to take care of your hair. It makes it soft and shiny. However, if your issue is hair fall like mine, I didnu2019t notice a big difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really like this product! It makes my hair feel super soft and doesnu2019t have a strong smell to it which Is nice!

reviews.review_title: Itu2019s a fun little luxury, that may be it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster. I used it for about a month before reviewing, letting it sit in my hair for 5-10 mins (or more) before shampooing. Iu2019m torn about this product! I love the smell, the fresh feeling it gives my scalp when applied, and the overall experience. Howeveru2026 I canu2019t tell if itu2019s making a difference. Products like these are so hard to monitor! I really enjoy using it, and if this is the type of product your looking for, Iu2019d say go for it. But I donu2019t think itu2019s a must have product for me, sadly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn't see much of a difference. I have a dry scalp with oily roots so it just seemed to make my hair more oily and coarse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fable & Mane HoliRoots Pre-wash Hair Treatment Oil was gifted by Influenster and Fable & Mane, However, I had it in my Sephora shopping cart and ready to purchase it when I finished the hair oil I was using. This hair oil contains roots and leaf extracts that strengthens hair and supports hair circulation. I like it also contain Castor oil but not thick, it is in a runny thin oil form. I apply to my scalp and letting the oil sat for hours before shampoo. I can see I have less hair falling off and hair have been soften, I am also taking biotin supplement that helps the situation.  I donu2019t care the fragrance in the hair oil, and wish it is not on top of the ingredient list. Overall I like this hair treatment oil and will recommend to others. Have you tried their shampoo, does it work for address hair thinning?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing product for all hair types. My wife and daughter both used this and they have very different hair types. It hydrates your hair and scalp and left their hair much softer. Their hair was stronger and the scent was calming. They will both be adding this into their weekly routines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Not bad, but I did not see a big enough difference to continue the product and treatments. I have dry scalp in a few areas due to surgery. Minimal difference after applying. I will say my hair is overall softer and the fragrance was pleasant. Thanks for the opportunity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised how much I liked this product.  I didn't know how is feel about adding oil to my roots since my hair tends to get oily naturally.  This product made my hair really soft and shiny but not oily looking. It washed out really nicely when I shampooed my hair and the sent was great.  It smells earthy but subtle, definitely not overwhelming. I would recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never used a prewash before so I was excited to try this. First thing I noticed  is, It smells amazing.  I didnu2019t put much I was a little iffy about putting oil on my roots before washing   But i opened a few parts in my hair and put a small about. Rubbed it through and let it sit for 5 minutes as instructed.   It washed out quickly and easily. I noticed my curls were defined and pretty after using so it didnu2019t weigh my hair down.   I have color treated hair and had no issues.  I am going to be honest I didnu2019t read instructions so I used this completely wrong at first. I used it as a traditional hair oil and it worked.  I used it as hair oil too.   Over all pleased  I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion but the opinion expressed is all my own

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE This hair oil. I love the scent, it is not too strong but I can smell it throughout the day. I use this the night before I wash my hair in a braid. I have noticed an increase of my baby hairs since using this oil! I am so happy with this product and will continue using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this stuff it is amazing my fine hair feels fuller and healthier. before finding this I wouldu2019ve never thought of a pre-wash with oil. I canu2019t believe the difference it has made in my hair just from using it once a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was very curious to try this hair serum when Influenster sent it because I'd never used one before, and I drink a tea that has ashwagandha, so I'm aware of some of the benefits. The packaging is cute!   Upon arrival, I noticed that the dropper is very weak; you can barely get enough of the liquid out, so I had to do multiple pulls. The product itself smells good and doesn't feel heavy. My hair is naturally oily and color-treated, so I was a bit wary of how it would interact, but it doesn't seem to be much of an issue. I don't know if I've seen much of a difference yet because I've only used it a few times, but my hair does feel a bit softer and stronger.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What a great product! Before now, I would have never considered a pre-wash oil treatment for my scalp. I  am so glad I received it to review. I love everything about it. Iu2019ve used it once a week for a month now and my super fine hair is looking healthier and more full. Itu2019s lightweight with clean ingredients and leaves my hair healthy and shiny. I will definitely continue to use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing on first use.  Lightweight and not heavy.  Will update on continued use, looking for healthier thicker more hydrated hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite hair oil. One of the few hair oils that correctly describes how to apply it. Hair oil is applied only to the hair roots and must be washed off. I apply HoliRoots to my hair roots half an hour before washing my hair. The oil smells amazing and can be easily washed off with shampoo. The quality of the hair and scalp has noticeably improved. Hair is healthier, smoother, thicker and shinier. Awesome hair product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this scalp oil from Influenster as a complimentary My first impressions on this hair oil! It left my scalp feeling fresh and rejuvenated and it left my length feeling healthy and with SO MUCH SHINE! I can definitely see this becoming my go-to scalp oil, itu2019s wonderful and I absolutely adore the scent and ingredients! Weu2019ll done on this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love hair oils and use them regularly. This oil smells incredible and is perfect for my dry hair adding moisture right where you need it. Honestly, the only thing I ready didn't like about it was that you have to wash it out. Personally I feel that a leave in oil keeps my hair better moisturized. Anyway, I still loved using this product and received it for free from influenster

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for complimentary purposes from @influenster and I gave it to my daughter who has curly hair. She's been trying it for three weeks already and she loves how much moisture it provides to hair curls. I'd recommend you to use it especially if you have fragile hair or split ends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best hair oils I have used. I have left it on my scalp and hair overnight or used it as a mask under a plastic cap with heat. My hair looks and feels noticeably softer and stronger after use. I sometimes even use a small amount to moisturize my ends between washes. I would definitely recommend this oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells good but I was underwhelmed with results. I didnu2019t feel like it did anything special for my hair or leave any soft/ shinier than before. I have dirty blond, color- treated hair and normally use Kendra and Olaplex products for reference. Would not purchase again. I love the packaging though!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed the scent of this oil. As instructed I applied the oil to my scalp and let it sit before I washed my hair. I was not able to fill the tube with oil as when I squeezed the bulb it only filled 1/4 of the way.  This forced me to have to constantly try to get oil out of the bottle..which then got oily..and then slipped out my hand into the sink. Overall I liked the product and when I blew out my hair my troubled dry spots looked like they had retained moisture.

reviews.review_title: Honestly can't tell if it's doing anything for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for about a month, once a week. I can have oily hair in the summer, but it's fall and using this as a pre-shampoo treatment, it washes out nicely. I don't notice my hair getting oily so that's good. But really I can not tell if anything is happening. All I can say is my hair seems just fine taking it. I don't mind the aroma, it's like a earthy fragrance. And it's not staying on my hair so it doesn't matter much to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this as an Influenster on a Vox Box Campaign. I applied it to dry hair and followed directions as a pre shampoo treatment. My hair is color treated and fine in texture and I felt that it did not leave a residue or weigh my hair down. The only negative thing that I can say is that I do not care for the fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It definitely left my scalp feeling moisturized, if I could give 4.5 I would due to the scent not vein g my personal favorite. It's not bad just not my preference. Overall a quality seeming product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it!! The packaging is beautiful and I get so many compliments on my hair after I use this product! Iu2019ll buy again for sure

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product. I purchased the small size to try it out and loved it, so I bought the full size.   I have voluminous hair but with fine strands and this did not weight it down nor made it greasy. It is easy to wash out and deeply nourishes your scalp. Hair looks bouncy and healthy after use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary for my honest review. I am a CNA, so after my shifts I am gross and even my hair is probably contaminated. Using this oil before my nearly daily shampoo has helped to moisturize my scalp and keep my hair looking great. I used this for a month before reviewing. I used it a few days a week before shampoo, and one day a week overnight. It smells good and feels good. You need to try it especially if you shampoo lots like me. The only con would be a replacement of the pillow case after using overnight but you should be replacing that weekly anyway. Try this you wonu2019t regret it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has made my hair feel and look really healthy. Itu2019s so much softer than before. It actually even seems less frizzy. Love love love the smell of this stuff!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in exchange for my honest review. I wasnu2019t too happy with this. The package is very nice and it smells fine. But I left it on my hair for around three hours and when I washed it out, my hair was very tangled and my scalp was super scabby and flaky. It looked terrible. I couldnu2019t even get a brush through. It just doesnu2019t work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loved how light weight this oil is! It gives my scalp much needed moisture without it being oversaturated. Nice smell to it as well and is easy to distribute when massaging the oil in the scalp. I tried it both 5 minutes before washing and overnight and it performed well in both experiences. I was gifted this product for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this hair oil!!!! Itu2019s such a unique product because itu2019s a Prewash treatment and you can leave it on and let it soak for as long as you need. I put it on before I go to bed and let it soak in my hair overnight, but when Iu2019m short on time I just leave it in for ten minutes. I love rubbing it on my scalp and massaging it in to help with hair growth. This is now a must in my hair are routine .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this hair oil. It has a mild scent but it doesn't bother me, besides the scent doesn't remain after you shampoo it out.  it's a pre wash oil and I like using it overnight and washing my hair the morning after. I also use it when I'm going to the beach so it really soaks into strands while I'm in the sun .  I have fine,curly, dry ,frizzy hair so every bit of conditioning helps. I saw results after the first use  . My stands were significantly smoother especially the ends.  This oil is not super greasy and it washes out so easily.  If used as directed (as a pre-wash oil) you'll have great results. It also detangles hair very well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in exchange for my honest review. Iu2019m typically not a hair oil gal and usually donu2019t have time for pre treatments but was intrigued by this one. I do enjoy that it can be left on for as little as 5 minutes or overnight. I did find that this helped create nourished hair and has a nice fragrance. The main downside is that it does take a little extra effort to wash out and can make your hair oily (which for an already oily scalp gal like me isnu2019t ideal). May take a little more trial and error to get this one right but I have high hopes based on the few times Iu2019ve tried it.

reviews.review_title: My new favorite Pre-Wash hair oil!!!u2764ufe0f
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have bleached hair so Iu2019m always in search of products to help with the damage. This hair oil doesnu2019t  disappoint it smells great and leaves my hair shiny and smooth. Iu2019m growing out my hair so this product makes any frayed  ends I have smooth and my dry hair hydrated. I like that I can use it overnight or 5 minutes before I wash it. I was concerned it wouldnu2019t wash out easily but it does and leaves no residue or weigh down the hair afterwards. And the packaging is great I love products that not only I enjoy using but look nice on my vanity. I will definitely continue to use this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: At first I thought this product was only for my roots. Iu2019m not going to lie, the idea of putting oil on my roots sounds a little counter productive to me since I want body. I put the oil all over my scalp, roots and hair and left it in overnight. I washed twice and although my hair looked noticeably healthier, I still noticed some residue from the treatment, resulting in less body. I did however love the smell and did not think it was greasy after I washedu2014except for some residue towards my roots that left my hair flat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review. I've used this prewash hair oil 3 times now on my naturally thick, coarse, dry, wavy hair. My hair is color treated as well. I love the fragrance of this oil. If I could purchase a fragrance that smells exactly like this, I would be in  Heaven. It's a warm and spicy, yet soft and mellow scent. I applied the oil to my scalp and massaged it in. I let it sit each time for at least an hour, then gently brushed it through the rest of my hair before washing. I did notice that my hair was shinier. But the oil didn't really have any effect on my hair's level of dryness. I also did not see any tangible improvements in my hair's level of frizz or texture,  either. I would recommend this product to ladies who have a softer hair texture than I do and to those who want to pamper themselves with a prewash oil that smells wonderful and adds shine to the hair. But I was really hoping to see improvement in the softness and level of frizz that my hair has.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of Fable & Mane oil. It has a rich smell that reminds me of the tropics. Leaving it on my hair during days I work from home helped more than 5 minutes and then washing. Use sparingly until you find the right amount that works best for your hair. Otherwise, it can make your hair look greasy. It doesnu2019t help my hair as much as Olaplex does. I am older and have more dry, brittle hair. I think this would be great for younger women.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! After running with a ball cap on for about the past six months, my hair has been breaking off and is very dry. Iu2019ve been using this oil now for about a month. The scent is AMAZZZING! I heard they have a candle scented like this and I canu2019t wait to order it! I apply the oil at night to my scalp and pull through my hair. Leaving it on overnight is key I think. My hair has grown out about an inch, feels way softer, and the breakage is less noticeable. I can totally tell a difference in the texture too. It feels softer, relaxed, and bouncier. I am DEFINITELY keeping this in my daily routine! Thank you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have SERIOUSLY been working on my hair health the past couple of months and I realized I was not paying enough attention to the root of the problem -MY SCALP!   I have been trying out this @fableandmane scalp oil and I LOVE it!   You massage a drop into your scalp and leave it in for five minutes (I always try to do overnight or during the day since I work from home). Then, you wash your hair!   It does make your hair visibly oil so just make sure you do not do it when you want clean hair!   It also smells SO good! I do not know the long term impact yet since I have only been using it twice a week for three weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used this oil for a full month and noticed a huge difference in my hair. My hair is very thin, dry, and frizzy with loose curls. I would put it on at night and leave it on as long as I could before washing the oil out. It made my hair look and feel so much healthier and stronger as the days went on. The product smells amazing as well!! I was never worried about my hair being too oily after washing it. In fact my hair was more hydrated when using this.This product worked amazing for my hair!! Definitely will be buying this again!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product does absolutely nothing! It takes so much to cover whole scalp, and I felt no difference after using it for more than 3 months, once or twice a week. Waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this hair treatment oil! I get a dry scalp and hair from my purple shampoo. This product really helps keep my hair healthy and nourished. I like the ingredients and it smells great which sometimes I have an issue with for other oils because they can be too strong. The smell is subtle but very pleasant!

reviews.review_title: Doesnu2019t Deliver All the Results it Promises
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Glad to have been able to try this product in exchange for my review but it just doesnu2019t deliver all of the results it promises. For reference I have long, thick, frizzy, un-dyed hair. This oil smells pretty good.  It didnu2019t do a whole lot when I applied it to the 4-5inches at the ends of my hair and let it sit before showering-but it didnu2019t hurt either. Thatu2019s how I plan to use the remainder of it up. However, I hated the way it felt when I applied it the other suggested way, from tip to roots & scalp. It didnu2019t help my scalp but of course made me itchy much sooner than usual after a wash. And it took 2-3 washes after that, shampooing twice each time to get it all out. I will not be purchasing this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First off itu2019s a pre treatment. the smell is amazing, warm with a cashmere type smell. I have long thick hair so it took quit a few drops to coat my dry hair. I rubbed it all in starting at the roots to end and leaving it on for about 45 minutes. I then took my bath and washed my hair as normal. Afterwards my hair felt a lil less dry and nourished.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this free for review but I'm too scared to try it! I have platinum blonde bleached hair and a few of the reviews mention it tinting their hair a bit warmer. It has tumeric in the ingredients list, which if any of you have ever cooked with, you know stains everything it touches super yellow. Maybe that's not the case with this serum, but I'm just too scared to give it a try! Wish they would specify if it's safe to use on super lightened hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good things first the scent is good, the dropper idea is great for application and to avoid product wastage. Coming to how effective the product is, well it did not do much good to control hairfall. I still have hair fall, hair looks nourished(hydrated), but this happens with regular coconut oil too. I have been using this product for almost 3 weeks ( 2 times a week) but I did not see any new hair growth either.

reviews.review_title: Whyd You Have to Go and Make Things So Complicated
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster for review purposes. Ultimately I just think this is more complicated than itu2019s worth. Itu2019s a thick oil, that I found hard to distribute evenly across my scalp. I also felt like it took a lot of product to fully cover my scalp. When activated, this product has a strong scent too, so itu2019s difficult to leave on for too long. I also found it took extra time to wash carefully enough to get out all of the oil. Ultimately, I think there are just far easier, less time consuming ways to achieve the same results, such as a leave in or after shower spray. Since you need to be regular with your use to see results, to apply the treatment, let it sit, and carefully wash it out feels like too much of a time suck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells wonderful and feels really great going on. It isnu2019t too heavy. I used it by leaving it on for 10 minutes and then washing my hair as usual. My hair was super soft and silky after, and it feels much healthier and itu2019s shinier. I will continue to use this product and expect it to be wonderful in the winter when my hair and scalp is prone to dryness.

reviews.review_title: Scalp Feels Great & It Smells Delish
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this hair oil. I tend to have a very dry and itchy scalp and dry damaged hair from bleached highlights. This oil hydrated my scalp without making it overly greasy. I did bring it down one star because after washing it out, my hair was a bit more greasy than I would like. It could be user error, so I am going to try less next time. Not to mention the smell is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: During these winter months I have very dry and frizzy hairu2026and this product has really helped with it! The light herbally smell is very pleasant and I think it has a fair price for the amount of product you get. Canu2019t wait to sleep with the oil and see itu2019s magic!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a must-have! Let me start off by saying this hair oil treatment smells absolutely divine. I honestly was not expecting it to smell so good! The oil is presented in a glass bottle and paired with a dropper that allows you to control the amount of oil you want to use. The dropper itself does not fill completely; I'd say it fills about a third of the way. I have long hair, so I've been using 2-3 droppers per treatment. I like to apply the oil and let it work its magic for at least half an hour before washing my hair. The longer you leave it in, the better! You can even apply it and leave it overnight (as suggested by the brand) before washing it out, although I prefer to leave it on while I work on other stuff around the house. I've noticed this product has given my color treated locks some much needed TLC and nourishment. It's helped my hair not only feel softer, but also look healthier. Overall, a great product to add to your hair care routine. I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You expect anything labeled as hair oil to be greasy and thick. This isnu2019t that. For an oil itu2019s incredibly pure feeling and not greasy. It goes on beautifully, moisturizes the scalp and hair, and washes off without leaving any yucky residue. The scent when you open the bottle feels a little strong but it doesnu2019t at all feel overpowering on your hair. Itu2019s a great product that for me has helped my scalp feel less dry, which is so important since I color treat and heat style my hair. I also use a dab for my little girlu2019s hair which is long, and itu2019s gentle for her as well and helps me comb through the knots. I received this product through Influenster and would highly recommend and will continue to purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this hair oil! I tend to have a very dry and itchy scalp. This oil hydrated my scalp without making it overly greasy. The smell is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve spent years trying to find a product that would help my dry hair from shampoos to serums and creams and have found nothing that works like this does. It truly is a holy grail. My hair feels so smooth and soft after using it without feeling greasy. Its also insanely easy to use, I usually use it before bed. I received this free for reviewing purposes and I will definitely be purchasing, worth every single penny and so glad I had the opportunity to try it.  Iu2019d recommend using a full dropper or two to maximize the effect.

My hair and scalp are super dry after repeat balyages. I have used this product a couple different times already and it has made my hair and scalp feel nice afterwards. My scalp isnu2019t as itchy and my hair feels like it has so moisture back into it. The scent is light and pleasant also! I received Fable & Mane HoliRoots from an Influenster campaign.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this hair oil. It felt hydrating but not greasy ( anymore then any other hair oil) washed out easily without leaving a residue behind. My son has a dryer scalp and he really liked it as well.  Received from influenster for review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Influenster in exchange for a honest review. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

I like how well the oil absorbs and how nice it smells, and I do feel like itu2019s worked well in my hair routine! I feel itu2019s a bit overpriced for the amount, and I can find alternatives that work but arenu2019t quite as nice for a lot less. I will likely repurchase when I can find a sale and I do recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve only used the product twice, but so far so good. The smell is strong, but I donu2019t mind it. After both uses, the hair around my roots was very soft and shiny. It also seemed to help with my dry scalp. Iu2019m excited to continue using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free in exchange for my honest review. Let me start by saying that it does smell amazing. And I am a lover of oils for the face and body. But I donu2019t really understand it for the hair and scalp. It does make my ends feel softer if I apply it to them. But no more so than a good conditioner. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First let me start by saying I didnu2019t know I needed this product for my hair.  I apply the oil at night and twist my hair in a satin scrunchie. This probably has to do with the fact that I only was my hair every 3 days to try and keep it healthy. This is not a deal breaker to using the oil.  Iu2019ve been dye free for about 20 months transitioning my hair to its natural grey.  I think with continued use I will see great results.  For now my hair does feel softer after a month of use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for my review and I am so glad I was picked for this campaign. This product came to me at the perfect time of year as the weather starts to get cooler and the heat is turned on everywhere. My hair and scalp are always dryer this time of year and this product made a noticeable difference. My scalp is less itchy now. Left unchecked eventually my scalp will be so dry it starts to get little micro cracks in it during winter. I didnu2019t used to have that problem, but as Iu2019ve gotten older all of my skin is changing. This smells really good without being overwhelming. I canu2019t attest to whether or not it helps hair growth or what not as it has not been long enough, but I have been shedding a little less.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually quite like this product. I was sort of on the fence about it at first. The scent is REALLY nice. Very subtle but enjoyable. Application is easy with the dropper. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: works wonders on my bleached hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

It smells good. It easily washes out. The oil goes a long ways. It has helped my scalp and hair roots feel healthier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: The Perfect Pre Wash Hair Oil

reviews.review_text: Treat your hair and scalp with HoliRoots Hair Oil. This product is a pre-wash treatment that helps repair damage and protect your hair. The price point is perfect, and the bottle is beautiful. This brand is vegan and cruelty free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: If you're unsure about hair oils, give this a try

reviews.review_text: I'm impressed - I had never considered using a hair oil before. My hair is very thick, but fine, and it gets weighed down easily. I do not currently color or otherwise chemically treat my hair, but it still can get quite parched, so I was curious how this would work.. I've tried this twice now - once for 10 minutes, and this second time for about 3-4 hours. I did see better results with the longer time period, though I don't think I'd go longer, personally.  My hair feels STRONG after using this, I'm not sure how else to describe it. Fortified? The texture does make it harder to run my hands through it. That's my only complaint,  but it's a minor one. I will likely try more products from this brand, and I would definitely recommend this to friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product! It made my hair feel so soft and rejuvenated!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Have you guys tried this new brand at Sephora? Iu2019ve been using this for a few weeks, even bleached my (v dark brown) hair a little, so listen up! Says donu2019t need strong roots, but I do have scalp drama. If I donu2019t medicated with shampoo, I get itchy, scales, nasty. So I was interested what this would do for my scalp. First, I put it heavily on my scalp overnight. When I woke up, I was expecting heavy, oily roots. To my surprise, my head drank it up! My scalp def wasnu2019t as dry as normal! I also used it as an all over treatment after going dark brown to copper red. Yu2019all, somehow, someway, my ends are NOT fried! What! Lastly, Iu2019ve used it as a leave-in on damp hair. It makes my hair shiny, but never looks greasy. Iu2019ve read reviews complaining the scent is strong, but that wasnu2019t my experience at all. The smell is light, but somehow a little nutty and spicy, as well. I really enjoy it, and never felt like it was competing with my perfume. I def recommend this if you want to feed your hair!! If you are looking for something that is going to be an instant hair perfect or, this is not that. It doesnu2019t have any silicones. But I do feel like it really nourished my hair!  Also for reference, I have long, curly hair. Tends to be dry. Protein sensitive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells so good!  I like to rub it into my scalp and keep it on all night , then was my hair in the morning.  I think it does a great job nourishing my scalp and my scalp is no longer dry.  I would definitely recommend this product as a kind of weekly home spa treatment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Influenster and Fable and Mane for my honest review. I only wash my hair 1-2x a week, and so Iu2019ve used the product 3 times now. Itu2019s very lightweight and has a very subtle herbal scent. The dropper only seems to fill a quarter or half way, but the oil is easy to spread. The first time I slept in it overnight, I didnu2019t see any noticeable difference; however my second time I kept it in for 20-30 minutes, and I may have had one of the best 3a/b curly hair weeks Iu2019ve had lately. By this, I mean - my roots were SO soft and had no frizz. (I lightly refreshed with Curls Quenched Curls Leave In Moisture, to get some of my curls more bouncy mid-week). For me, frizz is the roots means I really need to completely refresh or wash - so that was a win. Thinking this may be a fluke, I used the oil again a week later and left it in for about an hour. I even changed my hair products to see if that was what influenced the results - but they were consistent. I canu2019t talk about u201cstronger hairu201d, per say - but Iu2019ll buy this myself if it extends how long I need to really refresh or wash my curls each week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells super good, put it on my scalp and strands before washing, my hair felt softer as I washed it and post shower was still very soft. I used the fable and mane scalp scrub after the oil which worked wonders. Scalp is buildup free and moisturized. I feel that the combo is very balancing. Will buy again.

reviews.review_title: Will bring your hair back to life

reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try Fable & Mane HoliRoots Pre-wash Hair Treatment Oil because my hair is very long and has a lot of damage from balayage that I'm growing out. The smell is amazing! The best part of the application experience is rubbing it between your hands, feeling the warmth, and inhaling the aroma. I do wish the product were a bit more hydrating, but it has still done wonders for my hair. My hair is so dry and damaged that I would often wake up with a tangled mess before I started using the oil. The product feels so nice on the scalp. I think that the oil is well worth the price because a little goes a long way. I do use quite a bit when I use it, but my hair is very long and thick. That still doesn't change my opinion that it's worth the price. I'm including a picture of my hair after using the product. It is air dried with absolutely no product in it. The oil has definitely added some shine!

reviews.review_title: The product I didnu2019t know I needed!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! For starters this smells INCREDIBLE. For reference I was my hair once a week. I used this the night before a wash. I would drip the oil onto my scalp/roots and then rub it in with my fingers. I slept in it and like the results I got. Before my roots were so dry that when I would get out of the shower they would still be dry like they didnu2019t even get wet and I had a lot of dandruff. After using this for a month I saw noticeable changes even after the first wash! My roots are now so much more hydrated and not dry after getting out of the shower. Iu2019ve also seen a huge decrease in dandruff. Iu2019m so excited to see what kind of long-term results this will bring with continued use. I highly recommend!

I wasn't sure if it was something that would go away after it was dry, but it still smelled. Once dry, my hair did not feel or look any different than normal. Overall, the after-smell will 100% prevent me from using this product again. I received this item for free in exchange for my honest review and opinion

reviews.review_text: My new favorite hair oil! I leave it in for 30 mins once a week, and it washes out without leaving my hair heavy or oily. Great for color treated hair, leaves it silky smooth and easy to brush. Also smells amazing, and cute packaging!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hair oil is honestly amazing!! I massage my roots with it around 30 minutes-1 hour before showering, and I've definitely noticed less hair loss when I brush my hair and even a thicker hairline!! I got this in a set (which was the same price as this full-size oil), but it really is worth the money if you are thinking of buying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The best oil i have ever used. I have my third bottle going on, it has made my hair more silky, soft and strong. I am seeing differences in my hair line. I m not losing the amount of hair i was loosing before . Its been a year it working great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review. I absolutely love the smell of this, if it were a perfume I would definitely buy it! I use it twice a week, leave it on overnight and wash out the following morning. So far I have not seen any changes in my hair but I will continue to use until itu2019s gone and see what happens. As it is oil, if you will be leaving in overnight I suggest wearing some type of cap or cover on your head so you donu2019t get it on your pillow transferring the oil to your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first glance, I was very impressed by the packaging. The product comes in a glass bottle which feels and looks substantial and expensive. Although the packaging is nice, the most important aspects (at least to me) are the ingredients and performance. Even though the ingredient list is long, it contains no water and aside from fragrance the only other ingredients are all oils and extracts - no silicones - and itu2019s vegan and cruelty free. As a cosmetologist, I definitely appreciate all of that. I also appreciate that there are not a lot of products like this on the market. Most oils are leave in, which can weigh hair down or make hair too soft and/or heavy to easily style. Most people with fine hair completely avoid oils altogether because of this, but since this Fable & Mane oil is a PRE-WASH oil, it truly is for all hair types. I applied the oil to my long, color treated hair and left it on overnight with a processing cap on to protect my pillow. After washing and conditioning my hair in the shower the following morning, my hair felt silky and smooth and combed out very easily. I also noticed I lost less hair while washing and brushing. I really liked this oil, and I will continue to use it and recommend it to others.

reviews.review_text: This hair oil is FANTASTIC! I must admit, I was very skeptical and a little hesitant to use it at my roots like the instructions say as that had always been a complete disaster with every other hair oil Iu2019ve ever tried. Normally if I put oil above the bottom third of my hair it all ends up looking greasy and gross. But I went for it and was amazed with my results! My long hair Is already pretty shiny and healthy looking but this stuff really elevated that in a way that was so noticeable that I had friends and coworkers asking if I had changed my hair products and strangers were complimenting me on my hair a lot more often. It looked and felt super smooth, shiny, and healthy, and moisturized without looking oily. Iu2019ve been using it a couple times a week for three weeks now and have just fallen in love with this hair oil. So far Iu2019ve left it on for as little as 2 hours and as long as overnight and havenu2019t noticed a huge difference in the outcome. I do make sure that I rinse my hair really well prior to shampooing my hair and I always make sure that I am doing a thorough shampoo job. This is what I did the first time that I used this product since I was pretty worried my hair would be a mop of oil the next day. I donu2019t want to deviate from this process now that I am loving the results. Some reviewers mentioned a strong or unpleasant scent and I canu2019t agree with that. To me the scent is lovely and not overpowering. I canu2019t say that my hair has become thicker or has grown faster; it hasnu2019t been enough time and I already have very thick hair that grows fast so Iu2019m not sure I would notice anyway.  I definitely feel like the strands of my hair are a little stronger - I noticed I am not losing as much hair as before when washing or brushing my hair. But most importantly to me is the way my hair looks and feels after I use the Holiroots Hair Oil. It was exactly what I needed to up my hair game!

Iu2019ve been coloring and highlighting my hair for years and just started letting my natural grey grow in a couple of years ago. The ends still have color/highlights and tend to get a little dry and crispy.  On days Iu2019m going to wash my hair, Iu2019m applying the Fable & Maine HoliRoots to my scalp and roots, then I put my hair up in a clip for a couple of hours while I put together dinner and eat. Itu2019s been wonderful so far leaving my hair and scalp perfectly hydrated. It washes out great and doesnu2019t leave any kind of oily residue on my scalp and Iu2019ve not noticed my hair or scalp getting any oilier between shampoos. Thatu2019s great news.   I do use a leave-in oil on my ends most days to keep the flyaways at bay, but the Fable & Maine HoliRoots is not that kind of oil. Itu2019s meant to be washed out, not left in.

Overall this is a great product from the ease of application to the look and feel of hair once dried.  I will continue to use this as part of my weekly routine and hope to see additional positive results like hair growth and strength.    #holiroots #influenster

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this oil with a lot of skepticism since I have curly hair and some other oils have been way too heavy on my hair. I have to say after using it while on vacation, constantly in and out of the pool and the beach, I can attest that this product stands the test and is one of my favorite to use post-swimming as it restores the shine and softness to my hair after all the harmful pool chlorine. This is a new MUST!

reviews.review_title: Great smell but not such great results
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the idea of this product and the packaging and the luxurious smell made me excited to try it. I tried it with it in my hair over night and then with it in for a few hours. I did find that for application, I had to drop it directly on my head to get it into the scalp and it seemed to take a decent amount of product each time, but I do have long hair. Unfortunately, once I washed my hair, I actually felt that my hair was duller and more coarse than usual. I normally use Oribe shampoo and conditioner and follow with Olaplex bonding oil. This keeps my hair shiny and healthy. After a few times trying the Fable and Mane, I plan to gift this to my daughter and return to my beloved Olaplex oil. Thank you to Influenster for allowing me to test this product in exchange for my honest review. #fableandmane

reviews.review_title: Hair got greesy quicker, scalp less dry.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received Fable and Mane hair treatment oil in exchange for my honest review, I used this for a week. In that time I seen my scalp less dry, however my hair felt like it got greesy quicker. It did help with my dry scalp however.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve enjoyed using this. It smells amazing, it rinses out nicely, and feels light and soothing on my scalp. Iu2019ve had the best luck using this primarily on my scalp; I burned through half a bottle trying to use this as a deep treatment for my hair and I donu2019t think it made a big enough impact to justify the amount used. But overnight on the scalp has been lovely. The oil doesnu2019t seem to leave greasy spots on my pillows and doesnu2019t run down my face during early morning workouts. Iu2019ve had great luck washing it out with warm water and shampoo and havenu2019t noticed any residual oiliness. The dropper only sucks oil up about halfway, though, so I feel like Iu2019m constantly going back to the bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product as I love hair oils and hair treatments. It starts out with a mild herbal scent but turns into this strong, musty herbal scent. Itu2019s terrible. I wore this overnight and had to wash my pillow. Itu2019s a noticeable scent and it lingers even after you wash your hair out. I also applied it to my scalp as well as hair and it irritated my scalp. I didnu2019t find it made a difference in my hairu2019s hydration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product has worked wonders for my scalp and hair!! I live in Colorado where weather is typically very dry, so this has helped keep my scalp hydrated and my hair more silky and moisturized. I like to apply this the night before my wash day, and my scalp feels like Heaven the next morning. Plus the scent is divine! Very invigorating and refreshing. Trust me, your scalp needs this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The fragrance of this is nice at first but is pretty strong and can be overwhelming. It left my hair pretty oily after 1 use. I will be using more but first try Iu2019m not seeing any benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the ritual of applying a nicely scented hair oil before a shower. I have thick and wavy hair that frizzes at the slightest hint of humidity. This is one of the only products that Iu2019ve ever used thatu2019s really helped make my hair noticeably more shiny and smooth. My hair absolutely loves this stuff. The scent is so nice that I wish they made a perfume oil or hair perfume with it! Iu2019ve used it once a week for a few weeks now and still have tons of uses left. A little goes a long way and it just feels luxurious. I will definitely purchase it once I run out. Highly recommend this oil!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best Hair Oil i ever had. It smells really good. And smoothens your hair.It gives you a relaxation after applying this. I would really recommend this Hair Oil to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m going to be direct with this review. The fragrance is so strong in this oil that I donu2019t enjoy using it. I followed the suggestion of applying before bed and the fragrance was so potent that it was distracting when trying to fall asleep. I didnu2019t notice any additional benefits above what other pure hair oils (e.g. coconut, almond, jojoba) can do for you. If you arenu2019t fragrance sensitive then you may enjoy this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, if you like scented products this is a must try, the scent is revitalizing and calming somehow, it makes you want to actually take care of your hair just to keep smelling it.   I recently cut my hair short because it was too damaged, so even though it is healthy now, this oil turned it into a shiny mane, just when I thought it couldnu2019t look better.  I didnu2019t notice much help in shedding less hair, but I have been using it for only two weeks. What I did notice right away is that it helps control the frizz and shape of your hair after washing it, which made my routine a lot faster and my hair looked more maneagable and healthy.   The only downside is that the product runs out quite quickly and itu2019s a bit expensive to repurchase.   I absolutely recommend this if you had given up on trying new hair care, this actually does something and it shows!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this for a week now, and I have to say Iu2019ve noticed my hair feeling a bit softer and my scalp feeling more hydrated. Even when leaving it in overnight my hair never feels greasy or oily from it. I do prefer to use it about 30 minutes before a shower as a pre wash though. The scent is wonderful in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so excited about Fable & Manes pre-wash hair oil! Let me start with the smell, ahh the smell. It's absolutely amazing and I feel like I've been transported to a spa while massaging it in. If you like anything to do with relaxing scents this product is for you! It's cruelty free, a vegan formula, made for all hair types and has no silicones! My hair is softer, and visibly healthier. My split ends are on the mend and I honestly feel like my hair is growing faster. My scalp that always gets irritated in the fall and colder months feel refreshed without being oily! I'm amazed and wish I would have found this product years ago.

reviews.review_title: Do you want shiny and healthier looking hair?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Fable & Mane HoliRoots pre-wash treatment oil from #influenster in exchange for an honest review and I was so excited to try this treatment! I have long ( almost to my waist) black Asian hair and even though I donu2019t have a lot of issues with my hair, I wanted a little boost to enhance shine and vitality. I was not disappointed- the application is simple, just a few drops on my scalp and rub it in and through your hair. A little goes a long way so donu2019t go overboard. I let the oil do itu2019s job, I left it in for a few hours to let it really absorb. The smell is heaven- I felt like I was in a spa! The formula is light and itu2019s not greasy, but you definitely have to wash your hair two times to ensure itu2019s not leaving a heavy residue. I let my hair air dry as always and WOW. The shine is similar to having a professional gloss applied but without the chemicals that typically damage your hair. My hair is shining and so soft. I received multiple compliments and my daughter (22 and has light brown hair) even used ir. I have added this to my Sunday self care routine because I love the results. I highly recommend!!

reviews.review_text: Let me first say I received this great product complementary from Influenster and Sephora for my honest review.  My hair and scalp tend to be oily. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have thin, damaged, or even if you have perfect hair, you definitely need this hair oil in your daily hair care routine. Not only does this hair oil smell so good but it makes your hair softer than you can possibly have imagined. Before I had trying this oil, I was quite skeptical since I hated hair oils so much due to them always making my hair feel worse than ever. The oils I used before always tended to weigh my hair down, make it fall out even more, and made my scalp quite dry. However, after using this oil, I'm motivated to oil my hair every week which for me is quite a big deal!!! All you need is a few drops depending on your hair length and just start applying from your scalp to roots(which is what I did), since a healthy scalp will eventually lead to healthy hair growth but you can apply it in any order you'd prefer. You'd also want to leave it in for a few hours or even overnight before washing your hair. Another thing that I loved about this oil specifically was that it was super easy to wash out unlike other oils that would just not come out within one wash. Overall, this hair oil has become a main aspect of my haircare routine and it has also led me to love and take care of my hair which is why you guys need to try it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have a very dry itchy scalp and my hair is always staticky and frizzy. After one use I noticed a huge improvement! This oil smells amazing and truly nourishes the scalp and leaves my hair smooth and shiny!

reviews.review_title: Holy Grail Even for Those with Oily Hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was SO impressed by this product and I generally avoid hair oils because my hair is oily to begin with. I received this product for free from Influenster and Fable & Mane in exchange for my honest review.  The first thing I noticed was the packaging. It looks and feels so luxurious. You can tell they put a lot of time and effort into the packaging. Itu2019s a beautiful addition to anyoneu2019s vanity.  The product itself smells amazing.  I would describe the scent as spicy but it also is light and floral at the same time. It isnu2019t too strong and overpowering and washes out so it may still work for people who are sensitive to strong fragrance.   I have used this four times now and my hair is loving it. I didnu2019t think Iu2019d need to take a before and after photo because, frankly, I assumed like any other hair oil Iu2019ve tried that it would make my hair too oily. When I first tried it, I used a small amount (maybe half a dropper) and focused it mostly on my scalp and a little less on the ends. I left it on for an hour before I washed it out. I used a shampoo brush while rinsing and shampooing to make sure I rinsed away all the oil. I did double shampoo as well that first use, just to be safe. When I got out of the shower, I brushed my hair and was pleasantly surprised to discover my hair was easy to brush through. I wasnu2019t expecting this to be detangling. I then let my hair air dry.   I woke up the next day with silky, shiny hair. I was also in awe to discover my hair was not oily the next dayu2026. Or the next. Three days post-wash and my hair was just as oily as it usually is without this product, and just as shiny and silky as the first day. I was not expecting that. I can confidently say this is a new holy grail product for me and Iu2019ll repurchase.  Now, after several more uses, I no longer feel double-shampooing is necessary to avoid grease. If your hair is oily, I recommend using a shampoo brush to really make sure the product is rinsed out.

reviews.review_text: This oil does a great job adding moisture to my hair before washing it! It smells great also. Hoping it will continue to strengthen my hair.

reviews.review_title: Adds Body When Applied Before Dry Shampoo
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first time I have ever really used a hair oil outside of 100% castor oil. I would describe my hair type as dry, thin/thinning, and lacking body/volume. To help prevent fallout (which is constant - I have male-pattern baldness, so I am also using minoxidil and Propecia daily along with red light therapy), I usually opt to wash my hair every 3rd day while using dry shampoo between washes. When using the dry shampoo alone after washing/towel drying, my hair can sometimes feel too dry. I find that when I apply an entire dropper of this after drying my hair and letting it sit for 5-10 minutes before using the dry shampoo, it makes my hair look and feel less dry while also giving it more body - it really makes my hair feel so nice. The fragrance reads to me as soft floral - almost like lily, white jasmine, lilac, etc. Eventhough it has a subtle/pleasant smell, I am super sensitive to fragranced products, so this one is hard for me to wear overnight unless I also spray it with unscented dry shampoo. That is the only reason I gave it 4/5 starts. If it was fragrance-free, or contained less fragrance, this would have been a 5/5 in my book.

reviews.review_title: Great treatment for thick, dry frizzy hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received this product for free for my honest review. I have extremely thick, dry, color treated 3B curly hair. I only wash my hair once a week- it never gets oily, but it does get frizzy. The smell is a little strong for my taste, particularly since I need to use a lot of it (like, several droppers full of oil). I apply to my scalp after brushing out my curls, massage thoroughly, brush through, then apply additional oil to the rest of my hair. I then put my hair in a bun and leave it until I shampoo in the morning. My hair completely soaks this in. My hair is well conditioned after washing/conditioning (I use olapex 4 and 5), and I have noticed much less frizz throughout the week, and less scalp dryness. I will definitely repurchase after testing.

reviews.review_title: A spa like experience for your hair and scalp
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have only heard about this hair oil and its benefits. I can now confirm that it does what it says. I loved that it can be used as a prewash or used overnight for maximum results. I thought the packaging was so pretty. I loved the amazing fresh floral scent of red champaca and jasmine sambac. I needed about 5 droppers of this oil for my roots and long hair. I was worried that it would make my scalp oiler since I have never used hair oil like this before.  This lightweight oil felt so nice when I massaged this on my scalp and in my hair. The fragrance made me enjoy the whole experience. After I rinsed it out, shampooed, and conditioned my hair, I noticed that it did not leave my hair oily but more nourished and healthier. My hair felt hydrated, and my scalp felt clean and refreshed. I have been wanting to focus more on scalp care so I was so excited that I was given this opportunity to try this. This is a must-have for your hair care ritual. I highly recommend this!! This will be a permanent part of my hair care routine.

reviews.review_title: How did I miss this product for SO LONG?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I did not know this product existed! I have been extremely stressed and my hair has been showing it. I have been shedding abnormal amounts of hair and noticing thinning around my hairline. It is too soon to notice any extreme growth from this product, however I absolutely am noticing a vast improvement in the overall condition of my hair. When I use this before shampooing, my hair Becomes extremely shiny, Soft, and extraordinarily more healthy looking. It seems quite probable that such immediate improvement after having only use this product a few times could and probably should Result in more hair growth down the road. On top of that, this product smells amazing! Many are mixed on the scent, but I personally much prefer using a product that smells delicious over something that smells like the natural Earthy smell it would most likely have if no fragrance were added. While I do not like fragrance in skin care, I have no problem with it being added to hair products. I am also using two drops of this on the ends of my hair after shampooing only on the ends And most damaged areas. This is proving to be a good combination for me - Using both as pre-shampoo and a couple drops was leave in. When using as leave In, It is important to me that it smells good for styling purposes and this delivers. I am looking forward to trying more products from this line and Iu2019m grateful a product like this exists.

reviews.review_text: Unfortunately I didnu2019t like very much the product for my hair. The smell is very good and I would like that fix more in my hair. It increased the shine but left my hair coarse and darker. So isnu2019t for me.

reviews.review_text: I wash my hair twice a week and have incorporated this hair oil into my routine. The smell of this oil is so nice and fresh, I just wish it lasted longer. Since using this I have noticed my hair is shiner and a lot less flyaways. This oil keeps my hair healthy in between washes.

reviews.review_title: I love, love, LOVE  this oil!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received product as a free sample from Influenster and Fable and Mane to try out and give my honest opinion. This hair oil is amazing! I love everything about it. I have very fine, thin hair with an oily scalp. This oil not only softened my hair, but also gave it more body and made it stronger and silkier.  I use about 12-16 drops, massaging about 4 drops at a time on to my scalp. I work it all over my scalp, then run the excess thru my hair (focusing in the ends because I get split ends). I've left it in for anywhere from 4 hours to overnight. I get better results with keeping it in overnight. Then, I double shampoo leaving the second shampoo in while I wash. It washes right out.  Some say the smell is too strong. I highly disagree! The scent is very exotic. A nice relaxing woodsy and floral scent that dissipates quickly. It leaves my hair smelling great! I would recommend this hair oil and plan to buy another bottle after I run out. A little goes a long way. This bottle will last a long while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product! It's really easy to use, smells wonderful, and works very well on my hair. You can apply 5 minutes up to overnight before washing out. I usually apply about an hour ahead of washing. It washes out easily and truly leaves your hair feeling healthy and hydrated! It also has a nice shine. I only use 2 to 3 times a week to avoid buildup and it is very effective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh this smells heavenly! I tried it for the first time yesterday pre-shampoo. It was really hard to rinse out even though I wash my hair twice. I can't quite tell if my hair condition improved upon using this oil since it is still greasy from the oil application. I will try using less oil next time and will update. I received this product to test and review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had never heard of Fable & Mane before influenster sent me the Holiroots Pre-wash Hair Oil to try in exchange for a review. I really like this product, a lot more than I expected I would. I can't speak on any hair growth because I've only tried this product a few times but overall I really like it. To start, this product smells really really good. I don't like overpowering scents in my hair products, but this scent is light and musky and it clings to the hair and is so relaxing. I like putting the oil on at night before bed and then washing in the morning because it's very calming. The Instructions say to leave it on at least five minutes and up to overnight. I've done both with success. I have a lot of hair which makes it tough to get hair oils, serums, or scrubs on the scalp. This product comes with a long dropper which makes it very easy to apply the product to the scalp. My scalp feels very hydrated which is great because it's so dry naturally.  The thing I was surprised the most about was how soft my hair was after it dried. I followed my normal routine (the instructions say to follow up with their shampoo and I don't have that, and I don't normally use shampoo.) My hair is super super soft. All of it. Not just the roots. The oil makes my hair very hydrated and so so soft. I have very curly mostly 3B with a little 3 C hair that is usually dry dry dry. This stuff is amazing! These are just a few cons to it. One is that it says to use a dropperful of oil per use. My dropper cant suck up a dropperful, so I have to eyeball it. It also is a lot of oil for the size of the bottle. The formula is drippy, which is great for getting it on the scalp and hair, but also means some of it drips off where it shouldn't at times. And the third con is that it makes my hair darker when I use it. It's usually on the roots around where it was applied, but one time most of the hair was darker.  This product is a solid 4.5/5!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Never tried any oil for hair because I have oily hair. Surprised but it didnu2019t make my hair any oiler but left it feeling silky and healthier than ever. I absolutely adore the scent and ingredients!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had never heard of a pre-wash hair oil before, but after using this for about two weeks now Iu2019m hooked. The instructions say to leave the oil on for 5 minutes or overnight. Sephorau2019s website instructs you to leave it on for 10 minutes or overnight. With that said I left it on for about 15 minutes prior to washing. 1. I absolutely love the smell. Itu2019s not overpowering and itu2019s pleasant. 2. It feels more like a dry oil, which is characteristic of high end oils (I am a Herbivore fan). 3. The instructions say use at LEAST one dropper. So I used more all over my head. I have to say it did not leave my scalp any more oily than 5 day greasy hair. Needless to say, it felt good to wash it. 4. Due to my hair being fine, I donu2019t like to add a lot of product, especially at the roots. I dried my hair as usual and it does not feel heavy or weighed down AND it tamed flyaways (the little hairs on top of my head are not reaching for the stars). Overall, 4 stars for a first time use and have not yet experienced second day hair. Another note, I am a harsh with critiques. I have no problem spending hard earned money, but the product needs to live up to the hype, and so far, so good.

reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster in exchange for an honest review. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this oil complimentary from Influenster in exchange for my honest opinion. This hair oil is amazing if you have a dry scalp, thinning hair and need overall nourishment. I received this complimentary from Influenster for my honest opinion and I couldnu2019t be more thankful. I applied this for the first time yesterday as soon as I received my box. I have fine, thin, super long hair thatu2019s prone to breakage and I bleached it a platinum blonde hue 2 years ago which roughed up my hair to say the least and Iu2019m currently growing out my hair and Iu2019m on a hair health journey, if you will. Yesterday happened to be my hair wash day anyway (I wash my hair twice a week). I applied a dropper full to my palm and rubbed my hands together to warm up the product. Then, I applied half a dropper to the lengths and ends of my hair to make sure they get some love and nourishment too. I let it sit in my hair for about 5 hours (you can leave it on overnight too). I rinsed it out with lukewarm water first and then I shampooed and conditioned as usual. I let my hair air dry because Iu2019m trying not to use as much heat on my hair lately. First thing I noticed when my hair was mostly dry is that my hair looked much shinier and felt a little thicker and definitely smoother from my root to ends. I was super impressed by how well this worked so quickly. I plan on using this twice a week on both hair wash days so I can enjoy healthy looking and feeling hair and I canu2019t feel wait to see more benefits with long time use over the course of the next few months. I will be repurchasing this during the Sephora VIB sale in the next few weeks!

reviews.review_text: I was initially skeptical of this product so I bought the smaller travel size to test it out and I am really pleasantly surprised by this treatment oil. I've used it as instructed, massaging it into my scalp the night before I would wash it off and it makes my hair feel softer and my scalp is visibly healthier. Also, I really like and enjoy the smell (it made my pillow smell amazing too), but I can see it being off-putting to people who don't like scented products.  I've used it as a treatment oil on my scalp and also as a hair oil to apply after I wash my hair. I've always had trouble with argan oil or jojoba oil (other hair oils) weighing my fine hair down and just making it look greasy, but this oil soaks right into my hair strands and makes them look really bouncy and shiny (granted I only use like a drop or two max for the hair strands). reviews.review_text: If you have thin, damaged, or even if you have perfect hair, you definitely need this hair oil in your daily hair care routine. You'd also want to leave it in for a few hours or even overnight before washing your hair.  Another thing that I loved about this oil specifically was that it was super easy to wash out unlike other oils that would just not come out within one wash.   Overall, this hair oil has become a main aspect of my haircare routine and it has also led me to love and take care of my hair which is why you guys need to try it out.
