reviews.review_text: I was intrigued when I first saw this product, but I'm disappointed with the ingredients. This is a fancy blended oil, nothing special about it. Coconut is the first ingredient, and fragrance is the third. I don't know why products with added fragrances can be considered clean at sephora, but I try to avoid anything with fragrance as much possible, so this is a no for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this oil a lot. Smells like jasmine. My scalp became overly dry and began to flake (eew gross) from over-processing my hair. I started sleeping with this oil on my roots once a week and cut down on the frequency I wash my hair (which is also once a week), and have seen a huge difference in my scalp health. Iu2019m not sure if it was the oil, wash frequency, or a combination of both, but Iu2019m definitely going to keep using this oil. Hope this helps someone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing! Not sure if it does much for my hair, but I leave it on overnight when I use it. Extra hydration canu2019t hurt!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this product for about 9 months now and I swear it has worked wonders for my hair. Iu2019ve never received so many compliments on how healthy my hair looks. I rarely get split ends after using this, I have so much baby hair growth and my hair is soft and silky. Iu2019ve repurchased 3x and will continue!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to give this oil a try based on the good reviews but sadly it did not work for me at all. I do not have dandruff yet this oil created so much dandruff on my scalp, just overnight. Also, the smell of this oil is way too strong and I use strong perfumes yet this oil has a very non pleasant smell. Itu2019s so strong that the smell stayed in my hands, I had to wash it multiple times. I applied the oil before going to bed so I can sleep with it, the smell disturbed my sleep and it completely passed on my pillow. I couldnu2019t properly sleep all night. Then the next morning I had to shower right away and thatu2019s when I noticed all the dandruff it created. I personally do not recommend this oil, if you still decide to buy it, it is at your own risk.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The discovery set is the perfect way to incorporate Fable and Mane into your haircare routine. The shampoo and conditioner will clean, restore and soften the hair while the mask nourishes and hydrates the hair so well! And everything smells absolutely divine!! 200% worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This oil recovered my damaged hair. Iu2019ve been using oil for a month now and my my hair noticeably healthier and stronger. I have also noticed bunch of new baby hairs after the first use, this oil helps to speed up the growth process and Iu2019m very excited about this. And it smells good. I will definitely purchase another one soon!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was sent to me for free in exchange for a review by Fable and Mane. This hair oil completely changes the game. Itu2019s so relaxing while massaging in the oil and the fragrance is so beautiful. The next morning, I washed my hair with the HoliRoots line. It brought out my natural curls and my hair smelt so good. My scalp felt super clean and my hair felt so so soft and fluffy. I love this product. Holy grail!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After two uses, my hair is markedly softer and shinier. I thought it was going to smell gross because Iu2019ve used other pre-wash oils/ castor oils, but Iu2019m glad to be proven wrong.

reviews.review_title: The best hair oil for hair growth
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m obsessed with the hair oil!  It really helped me with the hair growth and overall improved the quality of my hair! Love the invigorating spa-like scent too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This oil smells so good and the way it has made my hair feel so smooth and shiny. It is very easy to apply and the way my hair has transformed just from a few uses is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product! It really helped with hair growth and gave my hair an overall healthier look! The oil smelled amazing and i love the packaging. It does exactly what it claims to do. I especially love how itu2019s silicone free!

reviews.review_title: Definitely new favorite hair treatment oil!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product so much! Iu2019ve been going through a lot of breakage because I died my hair a few months ago and also because of the heat of hair tools that I use a lot, and this oil was everything I needed to help my hair heal and become stronger. Looking forward to continuing using it to see more results regarding my roots as well. It also smells so good! Excited to see my hair looking healthier than ever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells nice havenu2019t used enough to tell what the benefits are.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Why some people say this oil smells bad is truly mind boggling to me. I was worried about the reviews, but I decided to purchase it anyway. The fragrance is lovely! I massage one pump of this oil in my scalp and a little on my ends. Leave it on overnight and wash my hair in the morning. I took off one star because I didnu2019t help my dry scalp BUT my hair does look healthier/shiner. It might be too early to tell in regards to strength or thickness. I will edit my review if things change!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My hair can get pretty frizzy in the summertime humidity. After using this hair oil I can tell a huge difference! My hair is shiny and soft. I have to wash my hair well to make sure none of the oil remains, but thatu2019s the only recommendation I have for others. Also, I was worried from other reviews about the smell because I hate strong smells but this smells really good and doesnu2019t linger after washing.

reviews.review_title: a MUST have staple in your hair care routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This pre wash oil has done WONDERS on my hair! I already feel I have a more hydrated scalp and strands. I donu2019t think Iu2019ll ever stop using this oil now!!If youu2019ve never tried hair oiling before this is a great place to start. 2 hours prior to my shower and voila!

I absolutely love this oil for a pre-wash treatment or to add a little extra shine to my hair! I massage a couple drops into my roots and onto my hair then rinse when I wash my hair or leave in overnight. It also smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a desi girl, Iu2019m always trying out a bunch of hair oils to help strengthen and protect my hair and this one mine have to be one of my all time favorites. To start off, it smells amazing and is super lightweight (which makes it easy to wash out). I also love how it makes my hair feel SO silky and smooth after washing it out. I love how it contains so many amazing traditional Indian ingredients such as Ashwagandha and Dashmool!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing hair oil! So soothing & smells fantastic. Definitely would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just ordered this and already in love. It smells SO GOOD!!! I left it in for a few hours and my hair feels incredibly soft. Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best nourishing overnight oil, and prewash treatment I have used on my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product because it had so many good reviews of making your hair more thick and shiny!! After using it for a week no progress my hair is so thin and it only made my scalp more oily! So disappointed especially for the price that I paid for it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Hair Oil first off smells incredible and I love how lightweight it is! It does not leave my hair feeling greasy and I love using it as a Pre-pop treatment! Makes my Shampoo and Conditioning work so much better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have been using this for a month and feel like my hair has been falling out less! I love putting it in my roots but also combing it through to my ends and leaving on overnight. It smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Waste of money. Her hair was just as dry and thin as before she bugged me to buy it for her.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this because of the great reviews, but Iu2019m not impressed, personally.  I have some hormonal hair loss, but when using this I lose way more hair. On top of that, I donu2019t notice a difference in my hair whatsoever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell and the product works beautifully. My hair felt super nourished the next day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m absolutely in love with this, it smells so good and feels so light.

reviews.review_title: Scalp and hair feel soft, volume, moisturized
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love this product.  My scalp feels moisturized and hair feels thicker.  I keep the oil on for as long as possible before shampooing.  The scent is decent (unlike their other products) and goes away after shampoo.  Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The reason I can't give this hair oil a higher than two stars is the smell. The fragrance is so strong that I feel it is masking some other chemical. No it does not cause hair thickening, not sure why this product claims that. The pluses are you only need a little bit maybe one or two drops and more and it is too much fragrance. It is a light hair oil which another plus. Must be nice to get stuff for free, I paid for this with my hard earned money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I will never change from this brand Iu2019ve bought all 4 products they sell and itu2019s changes my hair dramatically!  I use this in my roots and ends before I put on the hair mask I leave it on for about an hour. Shampoo and conditioner from this brand and my hair... girl... my hair!!! I have LESS FALL OUT! My hair is glossy!!! And smells fantastic!! FOR DAYS!!!! This brand gave me a glimmer of hope and my hair is thankful for this brand! So glad I stubbled across it! I live in FL the heat someone asked me how my hair kept straight from all the humidity hahaha itu2019s because of this brand.

reviews.review_title: Frizzy + Wild Hair? Give it a try!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this stuff! I have super dry and frizzy hair and using this before wash day helps to tame it, and strengthen it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The holi roots hair oil is amazing for cleansing an oily scalp and left my hair feeling and looking very healthy and voluminous. I was gifted this product from fable and mane and love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This hair oil has done wonders after just 2 uses. It smells so good & helps to hydrate my scalp to stop the itchiness. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff makes me excited for hair wash day! I really enjoy the smell and letting it sit in my hair for a few hours/ overnight. Day 2 after washing my hair I still notice a dramatic difference in how my hair looks and feels. It feels thicker, stronger, smoother, less damaged and looks shinier and overall more healthy. I'm looking forward to seeing the results after consistent use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely ritual to care for your hair. Oil is improving my hair and scalp health. Castor oil has numerous well-establish benefits for skin / scalp health. Not surprised to see so many others comment on the improvement they have seen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve never used a pre-wash hair oil before but I LOVED it! The Fable & Mane hair oil made my hair feel thicker and softer after the first use. I used it overnight (as it says best results) and it wasnu2019t kidding. It out the moisture back into my dry and damaged hair. Will definitely be telling everyone I know about this hair oil!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've only used this a couple of times, and as an overnight treatment before wash day. My hair feels soft and I like the smell. Haven't used it long enough to notice a difference, but I will continue to try it out. I do not like the shampoo and conditioner but have higher hopes for this oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this oil smells and how it makes my hair feel! Definitely a great addition to my curly hair routine. Incredible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how this oil makes my hair feel. My hair feels so much healthier after use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this hair oil, I usually use it the night before I shower and my hair is so soft the next day. Hoping to see if it helps with regrow but havenu2019t used it long enough to tell. I have the entire line and love them all. My hair has never felt or looked healthier and Iu2019ve tried SO many other brands. Will be only using this line from now on.

reviews.review_title: A great addition to your hair care routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time using a treatment oil like this. So far I'm impressed, I like to massage a dropper or two full into my scalp with a silicone massaging brush. I wrap my hair in a hair wrap and sleep with it overnight, then wash it out in the morning. My hair has never felt so soft and healthy. I'm really hoping it helps my hair grow faster too with continued use. The only negative thing to me is the scent, it's very strong and perfume like, a soft floral smell would be nicer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely incredible. I use this once a week and sleep with it in. It makes an amazing difference. Totally worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have always had a dry scalp and dry hair.. after using this product for just a few weeks, I already started to notice my hair had a smoother texture and I even experienced less dandruff. In addition, I'm a big fan of the scent -- super clean and calming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my hair very smooth and shiny! It states that overnight usage works the best, but I think applying it for 30 mins before your shower works just as good, If not better. My hair is long, curly, and thinner. This helped with scalp irritation, shine, and in my opinion, it makes my washes last longer. I find that I do not have to load up on dry shampoo when I choose to not wash my hair after using this oil. If you are on the fence to buy it, definitely give it a try!!!

reviews.review_title: Perfect Hair Oil to fix damaged hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: You know that feeling when you finally found THE product that fixes your problems? This pre-wash hair oil was everything I want and need. I love that itu2019s silicone-free and full of rich oils to fix my dry and damaged hair. I use this twice a week and leave it for an hour or two before I shower. Just make sure you donu2019t overuse this. This works fine on my oily roots too!

If you are trying to find a hair oil that smooths and softens your hair, but doesn't have silicones- this is it. I use the HoliRoots Hair Oil once a week before shampooing and it has consistently left my hair looking and feeling healthier and smoother. It also has a really nice scent! I'm familiar with hair oils, but it's too much work for me to research the different benefits of each oil so that I can later create a beneficial mixture of oils to put on my hair. This hair oil does all of that for you. Just put the oil on your hair, leave it in overnight, and wash it out the next morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product for a few weeks now. I use it twice a week on wash days. I apply the oil to my roots only and massage it in. Whatever is left over on my fingers I apply to my eyebrows and lashes.  The treatment doesnu2019t make my hair oily and it easily washes out. I have noticed more baby hairs around my hairline and less hair fallout when I brush my hair.   Definitely will repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: totally a game changer for my roots and scalp! so nourishing, something I didn't know I needed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this!! Will buy again!! Nourishing for dry scalp.

reviews.review_title: Great for smoothing without static and more!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love using this, prewash, on my dry ends and hair around my face.  These are my very dry, damaged hair areas.  I have fine, straight hair.  Sometimes put on and leave on overnight, then shampoo the next day.  And I love to smooth a tiny dab onto my ends when my hair is dried.  Love that it smooths without leaving static, unlike silicone products do.  Smells amazing! Have also used on on my scalp as an overnight treatment. May be a bit too heavy for my scalp/skin type, still experimenting.  Really like this product and will repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product lives up to all the hype. Loved the smell, feel and the way it just simple soaks into the scalp and hair. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First, this stuff smells amazing! Itu2019s subtle and warm. I like to apply to my scalp and leave it on for 5-10 minutes before showering. I feel like it breaks up the product residue from dry shampoos, styling products, etc. and gives my roots shine without weighing my hair down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow - it really works! I can't believe that two small drops of this could transform my hair the way it does, I used it in the morning on dry hair and couldn't stop touching my hair all day! I'm so excited not having to accept friziness anymore!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love to use this in the morning on dry hair as a bonding oil. A little goes a very long way!! This bottle will last me forever so perfectly priced. Not too crazy about the smell does not smell like the shampoo conditioner or cream hair mask but itu2019s not that bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this every week and I swear it has helped to make my hair grow! I've used it for a year and it's amazing - haven't even gone through a full bottle. I highly recommend to anyone!
This oil was great! Left my hair very soft and ready to shampoo. I like that it only took 5 minutes to leave my hair soft!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted to me from Fable&Mane so I was super excited to try it out. My scalp goes through phases of being very dry and flakey and because I bleach my hair it can get pretty dry too. This product worked great for my dry scalp and hair! Itu2019s a must have before every hair wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this product in my hair overnight and it works! I notice more growth and thickness in the  front (near my face) where I concentrate the product. Plus, I love the smell - It's earthy... but understand that's not everyone's cup of tea. Definitely mine though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: 6 months ago I decided to embrace my natural hair texture (2C waves) instead of beating it into submission with a blow dryer and a round brush, and HoliRoots oil has been critical during my transition period. Iu2019ve been working on retraining my wave pattern, since my bleached highlights donu2019t wave as much as the rest of my hair. I use this oil all over my hair as well as my scalp the night before wash day; thanks to HoliRoots Iu2019m able to easily detangle my hair and my scalp feels great. At first I only used it on my roots, but since Iu2019ve started extending it to the lengths (just down past my shoulders when itu2019s dry) my hair is much less dry and feels way softer. I love everything about this oil except the priceu2026 yikes. But Iu2019ll still keep using it. FYI I havenu2019t tried the rest of this brand, just the oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love scalp oils and exfoliating treatments and wanted to try this. I have fine wavy color treated hair half-way down my back. I use a variety of scalp oils, scrubs, and chemical exfoliants already so am familiar with these products. I applied a few drops at a time to my fingers then massaged into my scalp, working my way around my head. The excess I wiped on my ends but I didn't concentrate there. I noticed right away it smells very good, and also the oil is not heavy, probably due to the sesame. I left it in for a few hours, then washed out with my usual shampoo. My hair smelled good and felt good after, but to be frank, it wasn't a standout. I have other oils that have more natural ingredients (perfume is the second ingredient on this!) and they are easier to apply. I will probably keep this and just use to the end of the bottle, but I don't see myself buying it again. I can't comment if it helps hair grow because I haven't had it long enough and so far only used it once. The one time I did use it, it smelled good and my hair felt bodified and my scalp healthy afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I soak my hair at night, sleep on it, and wake up with beautiful hair. Another tip, put it in before a workout! Once you shower, you'll feel so clean and energized. Definitely recommend this product along with the shampoo/conditioner. My hair feels so healthy and strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Iu2019ve gotten so many compliments on my hair and have been loving how it feels after I dry it from the shower.  Just be sure to use a towel or something on your pillow the nights youu2019re oiling your hair bc it WILL get all over.  I donu2019t drench my hair, just make sure itu2019s nicely saturated the night before I plan to wash my hair and let the oil do itu2019s thing!  In the morning, just sleek, soft, nourished hair!

reviews.review_title: Never want to be without this oil
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this months ago and absolutely loved it and finished my bottle. I was gifted another bottle and my scalp is loving it. Donu2019t want to be without this pre wash treatment ever again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the HoliRoots Hair Oil and I absolutely love how my hair feels. I feel my hair stronger and nourish. And the smell, it's just delicious. Also, I love that the product is vegan and cruelty free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely makes your hair grow. Makes your hair healthy and soft. Yes kinda burns depending on how dirty your hair is. But Iu2019d say it is worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have very fine hair, oily scalp and dry ends and I wanted something to help balance that out, and give my hair moisture. most leave in oils or other oil treatments leave my hair Still feeling oily and weighed down, even after double washing. This doesn't do that! I have left it in for a few hours and Over night. After a normal shampoo and condition my fair feels clean and not oily! the best part is when my hair dries.. it has a natural wave and body that I haven't seen  in such a long time, just from air drying. It feels full even tho I don't really have that much hair. Everytime I use it my bf tells me my hair looks cute when it dries. if you're sensitive to smells I guess it could be abnoxious, but I love it. It smells like a floral perfume, but it isn't overly strong for me and I love the scent. Just bought the shampoo and conditioner because I love how this makes my hair look and feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just want to say, if you are struggling with an oily scalp, GET THIS. I would apply it using the dropper directly into my scalp and sleep with it in overnight. The next morning, my healthy natural curls came back (have not seen them in a long time) and my scalp felt amazing. My hair used to oil up so fast but now I can really tell my scalp is hydrated and doing well 5 stars! The scent doesnu2019t bother me at all and I find it quite nice. It doesnu2019t linger for that long either anyway so if you can, BUY IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for almost 6 months now. It did not help much with hair growth but it does add shine to my hair after using it. It got me into massaging my scalp but the smell of this product makes me so nauseous that I can't use it too often or sleep with it on my hair. I would continue to use if I noticed more changes on my hair but it wasn't as helpful as I thought.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s bean a year since I started using it and Iu2019m on my second bottle. I absolutely love this and it really works. Itu2019s amazing on my scalp!!! I started noticing lots of new baby hair and I canu2019t get over the smell itu2019s amazing!! Love love this product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you have dry/damaged hair, this product is a MUST! It has completely changed the hair game for me. I went from having extreme straw-like hair, to having luscious locks in about a week! I have recommended it to all my friends and family and they are obsessed as well! You NEED this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! I've been using it once a week. You can leave it in for a few minutes or leave it in over night and then shampoo off. I don't like heavy perfumes and while this does have a scent, it isn't overpowering and rinses off!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was worried about the smell from the reviews. Cuz it really does smell like an old Indian uncle. But I mean look at the ingredients itu2019s some really Desi stuff. Meanwhile my scalp isnu2019t so itchy so thatu2019s nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this oil because I wanted to use castor oil, this oil masks the smell of castor oil which is pretty strong.ButI couldn't stand the scent it has, it's pretty strong. Also I have a very dry scalp ever since I started using it. I so wish I had liked this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This oil is divine for hair and smells delicious like fresh incense. This is how the whole set should smell but it doesn't. I use this before shower but also after it, cause is that great. I have recovering curly hair and this softens it really well and gives a bounce. This is the only product that I would buy from this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful treatment for dry itchy scalp.  It was so bad I would wake up my husband in the middle of the night with excessive scratching in my sleep.  This oil does everything it claims and I broke my no-buy, replacement only streak and I am so glad I did.  The fragrance is strong and lingers and I would have given it five stars if it was more subtle.  I massage the oil as instructed and put my hair up in a pony and a headband and do my workout.  The headband mitigates the strong perfume smell and the heat accelerates the process and when I shower, the oil comes out easily and my hair is super soft and bouncy and my scalp feels really good.  I would not sleep with this because of the strong smell.  it is not unpleasant, just too much.

reviews.review_title: tiktok got me and I bought it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: and I'm not returning it. I would say it's worth as much hype as it's getting (maybe I'm missing something), it's not life changing, but it's def a good product. my hair was a bit easier to manage in the shower at the root. it also smells really nice, like a soft floral fragrance (and I'm not a huge floral person...think fresh flowers). didn't mess up my pillow and not very hard to wash out. aaaand my scalp is noticably less itchy. I like this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has a very strong smell. I've been using this product for a few weeks, and the smell doesn't bother me anymore as I've got used to it. I put the hair oil as a leave-in treatment overnight and it really helps hydrate my scalp, which can get flaky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best. Notice a difference in hair growth after just two weeks. And I know I know other reviews   say the smell is awful, but I truly love it. It also not long lasting (the smell that is). You gotta get if your having issues with hair thinning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Softest my hairs even been followed by shampoo and conditioner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This oil did everything it said it would.... hydrate, smooth, and add lots of shine to my dry/winter hair. I enjoyed combination of oils and scents that makes this hair oil unique. It feel good in the hair and massaging it into my scalp was a self-care ritual I need to do more often. I little goes a long way, you only need a few drops in each section of scalp and hair. It also shampoo's out easily.   I like this oil and would recommend to anyone wanting more hydration and shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this for 5 months and itu2019s saved my scalp! I am a bleach blond and noticed my scalp isnu2019t as flaky or irritated after I get my roots done. The scent can be strong for some but they went to a perfumer in Paris so its legit. Asian owed too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Heavily fragranced and smells like a cologne. Please come out with something with no perfume or fragrance. Had to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've only used it for 2 weeks but my hair feels soft ,a slight volume,not tangled and noticeless oily and dandruff .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ah-maz-ing!! I was initially worried because I have fine, thin naturally blonde hair and I wasnu2019t sure if my hair could even handle oil but Iu2019m so pleasantly surprised. Itu2019s super light and I think the trick is to use just a little if you have hair like mine. I was ALSO worried about the reviews talking about the smell because I suffer from migraines and canu2019t even handle a candle being lit for two minutes but this scent is lovely and subtle! Trust me, if I can handle the smell you can. Iu2019m bleaching my hair next month and Iu2019m excited to use this to strengthen and soften my hair to prep.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, this is my 2nd bottle. Being Asian Indian oiling hair is a must before hair wash, this is just so lite and washes off easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved their conditioner and wanted to try out more from the brand. I love this oil because I feel like it really breaks up all of the dry shampoo from the week and it makes my hair so soft after I wash it out. It is really fragranced but I don't mind the smell. I like to either put it in my scalp at night and have it all night long or I'll do it in the morning and wash my hair in the evening. This is a new staple in my hair wash routine. I also have fine hair and don't feel like weighs down my hair after I wash it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best oils for dry fine hair! It makes my hair very soft and hydrated. I use it overnight before washing my hair. And it smells great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much!!!! It has improved the health of my hair immensely. I massage it into my scalp weekly and my hair has become so much stronger and grown so much. It also smells incredible. A little goes a long way and the bottle lasts so long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried many methods and products and tbh, I was suspicious at this product first. Iu2019ve been using it for 3 months and I canu2019t say enough about it. My hair does feels stronger and fuller and everyone else has noticed it too. I used this 1-2 times a week and I leave it for at least 3 hours. Itu2019s worths the price. Also, I use the dropper to put the oil straight on my scalp instead of putting it on my palms first. After I dispense the efficient amount I give my scalp a 2-5 minute massage and then put it in a braid. After taking a shower, my hair feels soooo much healthier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased this product due to the many good reviews and benefits I read about it. Unfortunately, this product did not work for me, at all. I used it as a prewash treatment and applied it to my roots, left it overnight, and washed my hair in the morning. After I washed my hair I noticed that I had large amounts of my hair falling out. I am well aware that naturally, you have some hair fall out but this was more than I had ever seen. It was very scary especially since this has never happened to me before. I have very healthy long dark hair and I normally use castor oil but wanted to give this a try. I know some products donu2019t work for everyone but this was my personal experience and I hope it is helpful for others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Went to my hairdresser for the first time since I've been using this (~10 months) and she said my hair has gotten thick! It's hard for me to tell a difference with stuff like this sometimes but my hair doesn't look nearly as thin is it normally is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Smells amazing and does wonders! Finally a product that helps deal with irritated & painful scalps.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! For six years we have tried every product under the sun to try to tame my daughters wild hair - sheu2019s multiracial and has very thick, dry waves that donu2019t hold moisture NO MATTER WHAT...until we got a bottle of this magic potion! After only three uses her hair has done a complete 180u00b0. It no longer becomes a rats nest if she so much as sneezes, no longer causes tears when we comb it in the mornings, and sheu2019s so much happier knowing she can have fun and be a kid without having to worry about how long it will take to detangle after every time she plays. We are sold on this!! Photo is what a u201cgoodu201d day used to look like, and the second photo is right before applying the oil to sit on her head for 30 minutes before we shampoo. Second picture is after a day of wild play and I could run my fingers right through it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally donu2019t write a review so soon after trying some thing but I am so in love with his stuff. Yes it has a heavy sent. It is pretty floral but I absolutely love it. Iu2019ve used lots of hair oils for my thinning hair. I have very fine thin straight hair. When I read that this was good for people who were losing their hair I tried it immediately. Iu2019d gotten the sample size. As soon as I used it I went online and ordered two bottles. I donu2019t know what it is but it instantly calmed my scalp. It was very soothing and left my hair very soft. Other hair oils I have used have either left a sticky residue or really heavy oily residue. This just seems to soak right in and my hair loves it. I normally donu2019t go to bed with hair oils on my head because itu2019s just kind of gross. But I gladly slept in this. If it truly helps with hair loss, I will update this review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Heavily fragranced. Caused headaches. This is the first product Iu2019ve ever experienced such sensitivity to fragrance. I am shocked they received a green light from Sephora. I do not see them carrying this brand for the long term. Do not purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you have dry hair, THIS hair oil the solution for you! My hair is really long and healthy but I find it gets dry at times.. Not only did HoliRoots make my hair smell AMAZING, it also changed the way my hair feels. Now I consistently have soft & smooth hair, and I can guarantee that I'm not using harsh chemicals or Parabens. The bottle is also aesthetically pretty ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this oil reminds me of the common practices in Indian households. But, this smells 10x better and is lightweight. I really enjoy the ingredients in this and loved massaging it into my hair. I slept on it overnight and my hair felt super nourished and shiny the next morning post shower!

reviews.review_title: Missing Link For My Impossible Hair Troubles
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally don't ever bother writing reviews but THIS PRODUCT!!! The smell is divine. Subtle and delicious it smells so good my partner who never notices these things commented on it and my cats are no joke following me around sniffing me which is pretty cute. I have LONG, THICK (and I mean THICK) mixed native American and caucasian hair. I am a swimmer, outside a lot, and nervously play with my hair all the time. I wear it in tight braids, and sleep on it and wake up to a birds nest. I'm super rough on my hair and it's always been a huge struggle. I've always wanted to grow it out super long but it gets so frizzy and dry and awful that I give up. My roots get oily and nasty too.  I started using this once a week and will progress to twice or more (I only wash 1-2 times a week now). I massage it into my scalp upside down and then section my hair and use a boar bristle brush to evenly spread and distribute it in each section of hair down to my ends. My hair is long enough I'll use a few more drops in my ends usually too. I then leave it in for at least 2 hours if not more, and then shampoo with Gisou honey shampoo and conditioner and gently blow dry just the roots to keep them cleaner for longer. MY HAIR IS SO NICE NOW!! I finally have a good relationship with my hair. It is growing in glossy and thick and fast (my hair naturally grows fast but this is fast even for me) and frizz is gone. I think a lot of it has to do with the boar bristle brush and distributing the oils through each strand, but this product is fantastic and has seemed to balance out my oily and dry scalp so that it is now pretty normal and just feels clean. The smell is so delicious, I wish they made a mist with it. Absolutely worth a try!! I have tried everything at sephora, natural oils, you name it. This is truly lovely!

reviews.review_title: THIS IS YOUR SIGN TO BUY THIS
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is so good. The smell alone would make me want to repurchase it smells SO GOOD. The smell is hard to explain, its florally but also earthy. I usually massage this into my scalp and run it through my hair the night before and wash it out in the morning. It leaves your hair so soft and shiny, and it has definitely helped my hair grow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my fragile thinning hair in hopes that it would reduce the thinning like it claims it will, but unfortunately I did not see a difference in thinning. I do like it as a pre wash to hydrate my hair and scalp and I feel like itu2019s nourishing. Donu2019t buy it in hopes of reducing thinning, but instead as a hydrating hair mask

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I initially received this as a sample in one of my past orders, I then purchased the full size because I absolutely love it!!! When I know that I will be washing my hair the next day, I use it prior to going to bed. Really helps with dry scalp and my hair feels much better after washing! I use it on my scalp and comb it through to my ends.

reviews.review_title: best oil to treat dry scalp
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free trial of this with the scalp promotion since I was desperate to find something to fix my dry scalp. Iu2019ve tried nearly everything - but this oil on my scalp pre-wash for a few hours combined with ouai detox shampoo was a match made in heaven! This oil is also a lot lighter than any other oil Iu2019ve used - which was really refreshing that I didnu2019t need to double wash. Will be purchasing a full size when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My scalp gets pretty dry in the winter and this has been great for hydrating it. I add a vial to my scalp once every week or so in the colder months to help hydrate. You need to wash it out pretty well after, but I get great results from this and it smells amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this oil because my scalp gets flaky and dry just above my forehead in the winter months.  I put this oil on overnight and wore a cap so it didn't get all over my pillowcase.  It really helped a lot after one use.  My scalp isn't flaky or itchy anymore.  I don't find the scent all that strong and the scent is pleasant to me, so that's not an issue at all.  Very glad I found this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m up to only a quarter of this product gone (so about a month or so of use, at least twice a week) and it is doing wonders! To be fair, Iu2019ve only noticed results after a month or so of use. However, my hair looks more full and volumized and it definitely looks healthier and it got longer! Mind you, I have very very fine hair that always falls flat and it takes a good 3-4 months to notice that my hair gets any longer! Also, less hair fallout than Iu2019m used to! I usually massage this at my u201cAyurvedicu201d spots first (8 fingers above the brow, then 12 fingers above the brow) before going through the rest of my head. This does mean I use at least 4-5 droppers of oil. I also do the overnight method (keeping the oil on overnight). The fragrance is a little overwhelming and smells quite masculine to me, but Iu2019ve learned to embrace it since it is a very good oil!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My current hair concern is thinning and weak strands. So I loved that this product would help with scalp circulation to strengthen my hair from root to tip. I personally love this product! I use it at as an overnight oil and I'll wash it off in the morning.

reviews.review_title: LOVE IT, BUT READ THE DIRECTIONS!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Clients need to understand that this is a WASH OUT oil. This is not an oil that you use after your hair as been washed, as this oil is specifically formulated for your scalp health and is designed to be washed out (this works wonderfully as an overnight treatment). I recommend using this oil before bed, rub the oil between your hands and then massage it into the scalp. Massaging the oil will help work the product into your scalp, leaving you with beautifully soft and luscious hair in the morning when you wash it out. I cannot recommend this product enough, just make sure you are using it properly!!

reviews.review_title: Heavily Scented. There are cheaper alternatives
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a 14 ml deluxe sized sample with my last purchase at the beginning of March. I've used half the bottle and will not be continuing. I have long thick slightly wavy Indian hair - Heavily scented - I have a sensitive scalp and noticed flaking and burning since using this product - made my hair feel dryer and brittle Personally I have been using castor oil mixed a thinner carrier oil (jojoba oil, almond oil, avocado oil etc.) combination for years as a prewash on my roots and it works better. I was expecting more from this product especially for the price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to preface this by saying that I like scented products, but the fragrance in this was excessive. I only used it once because the smell was just too strong for me. I put it on my roots before going to bed but I couldnu2019t stand the smell and an hour later I had to get up to wash it out of my hair. It also easily transferred to any part of my hands/clothing/bedding that came into contact with my head and the smell was overpowering to the areas where it transferred as well. The texture is very oily and wet and does not dry (even after I tried patting it dry with a towel), you wouldnu2019t want to wear this around other people because when itu2019s applied to your roots it makes them look extremely oily and unclean until itu2019s washed out. I donu2019t recommend this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m giving this 3 starts because the smell is so awful that it makes me not want to use it even though itu2019s a pretty good product. Itu2019s an oil but itu2019s light and not overly greasy. But the smell is so bad. I actually got a migraine the first time I used it. I wonu2019t be re ordering

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a Rouge member and this might be my first review. I love this product. I do not know why some reviews state the smell is strong or bad. I absolutely love the smell, it is very light and almost floral in nature. As a Punjabi-American girl, I have always used 100% Indian hair oils that work great but require a few washes to get the strong smell out. I usually leave this oil in during the day if I am home or a quick treatment before the shower. One wash and I am good, it is not greasy at all. I am hoping to try the shampoo and conditioner next. Everyone should try this!

reviews.review_title: Don't get scared off by the stinky reviews!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This wasn't available in my local store yet, so recommend ordering online instead of making a trip!   I was worried this would stink after reading so many reviews about the bad scent. I know fragrance is very personal but I don't find it nearly as overpowering as other reviews made me concerned about, and would even say I LOVE the scent that is there. It smells like expensive perfume - in my opinion. Plus if you do dislike it, who's wearing it out anyway?! Your hair is an oil slick... go to bed and have a shower tomorrow. I'm glad I gave this a shot! It is easy to apply, and after 2-3 months of regular use noticed far less hairfall than usual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best! I started using this on myself and my daughter because I saw it on TikTok. We have been using it for 6 months and both of our hair is stronger, thicker and longer. I first noticed when I was braiding her hair. It was so much thicker! Smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is incredible. I have bought 3 bottles so far and I plan on continuing to purchase every time I run out. The price is high, but to me it is so worth it. I was looking into oils to try and help my hair/scalp health. I had TONS of hair falling out in the shower. Like, enough that I was wondering if I was sick or if something else seriously wrong was going on. I stumbled upon this when it first came to Sephora and it had some great reviews so I gave it a shot. I have never looked back. The smell is delicious, think beach/island vibes. But the results are what make this worth every penny. After using this for a couple months (overnight at least once a week) my hair shedding is down to almost nothing. Literally there is so little hair falling out in the shower I donu2019t even need to clean the drain. And this is after 3 or 4 days of wearing my curly hair up. Which anyone who has curly hair knows, especially if itu2019s up, that their will be pretty major shedding when you shower. Itu2019s normal to lose about 50-100 strands of hair a day and curly hair gals see it more in the shower because curly hair tends to trap the stands that get shed. So when I have almost 0 shedding after not washing for a few days.....thatu2019s borderline black magic status. My advice is to try it. 1 bottle should be enough to see results. But guess what. It also makes your hair super healthy and seems to make it thicker as well. PLUS your scalp benefits. I use to not be able to go more than 2 days without washing my hair. I have fine curly hair and it would just get greasy fast. After using this oil my scalp regulates itself much better and I donu2019t deal with the greasiness that I use to, like at all, unless I go 4+ days without washing. AGAIN. THIS STUFF IS HOLY GRAIL. BUY IT.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING! Ok I love this stuff. This doesnu2019t smell as good as the rest of the line BUT it works so well. Itu2019s meant to be a wash off oil but because I have scalp eczema & a very oily scalp in general I use it on my ends on dry hair and donu2019t wash it off. Works great! Leaves me shiny & soft but never greasy. When I do want the scalp benefits I use it as a wash off mask and it doesnu2019t leave me overly greasy. So if you donu2019t have scalp issues def take advantage of the scalp circulation benefits. My fav out of the line!

I love a good oil treatment so this is amazing to me! The smell is pretty strong so if you are sensitive to scents, I would not recommend. I love using it before I start my wash process and will even add a couple of drops to the hair mask as well. Very nourishing and hydrating as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually really like the smell of this hair oil but I'm not sure if it's done much to prevent hair fall or breakage. I'm sure it does something - I just don't know what! I've used multiple hair oils - castor, coconut, and different Indian hair oils. This one is far too expensive for what it is. You can buy similar hair oils for much cheaper - it's the nice packaging and pleasant smell that you're paying for. Not the efficacy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am so please with this product. I thought I would try it because my hair has been thinning and I have experienced loss of hair by my temple area. I was amazed to see regrowth of small hair from the sites . I massage it into my scalp in circular motion 3 times a week. The smell is relaxing and fresh. I will continue to purchase because it is helping with my hair issues. I recommend it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this pre-wash hair treatment oil! So hydrating & nourishing! Love mixing a few drops with their mask together. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this oil! It rinses really nice out of the hair and it leaves it silky and smooth. And a lot of people say the smell is u201coverpower or bad smellingu201d but I really liked it and it wasnu2019t too strong in my opinion. 10/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this after reading the reviews and I didnu2019t believe this could smell this strong...it does! At first application I was delighted by the smell but after having it on for 5 mins I wanted to run from myself. Then my husband commented on it smelling like cheap perfume mixed with air freshener, ugh. Once itu2019s washed off it smells fine. In terms of effectiveness-I started using it 2x a week but noticed my scalp was breaking out. Now only doing it once a week and itu2019s kept my scalp hydrated(I suffer fro dandruff) this winter and have been seeing some nice growth at the root.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Only worked twice for me. Gave me really bad dandruff. Had to return.

reviews.review_title: HoliRoots is Now My Holy Grail for Scalp Eczema!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this oil!  I just got it 2.5 weeks ago, and Iu2019ve already noticed a huge difference after using it every other day.  My scalp eczema (seborrheic dermatitis) and hair loss (anemia induced) have both been significantly reduced!  I use it on wash days, massaging it into my roots about 30 minutes before my shower.  The smell is distinctly floral, with a strong ylang ylang note (to my nose), which I could see bothering those who are scent-intolerant.  Iu2019ve been considering adding a few drops of vetiver or patchouli to ground the aroma a little, but Iu2019m uncertain how that would affect the therapeutic quality of this oil.  I like the scent and have even dabbed this onto my wrists to wear as a perfume, but I really like ylang ylang.  Anyways. Iu2019m super pleased with the results!  My hair feels softer and stronger, with way less irritation and flakiness!  Iu2019m even considering buying the shampoo and conditioner now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The fragrance might not be for everyone, but Iu2019m OBSESSED with it. I would bathe in it if I could. I was nervous about using an oil on my roots because my hair has the tendency to look greasy with product in it, but it washed out so easily and left my hair looking so shiny and healthy! In fact, it really helped to break down product buildup I had from dry shampoo use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works really good for dry hair. And definitely nourishes the hair. Just massage on the scalp and works the magic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I admit that I just heard great reviews and bought this without reading anything about it. First, it's VERY FRAGRANT.  So much so that when I use it, it's almost hard to breathe.  Once I get used to it, I really enjoy the smell, but it's a floral bomb. Second, I wish there were more instructions on how often to use it. Third, it seems odd that it's the same amount for all types and length of hair, no?  The bottle is small, so I'd imagine if this was a semi-regular routine I might look for another brand -- or just castor oil (which is like the only ingredient outside of perfume).   Ultimately, it makes my hair feel fabulous.  And the smell lingers through the shampooing which I like, so this gets a B+/A- from me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell and how it makes my hair feel/look after I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a light weight hair oil that smells amazing! Love using it the night before I shower.

reviews.review_title: Took a chance- so glad I did!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews but this calls for it. I have fine, thinning, straight brown hair- never colored or permed. I am on a quest for more body and growth. This is the first product I tried so nothing else changed.  I have put about 3 - 4 drops in where my hair is most thin and massaged at the roots/scalp, leaving on overnight. This is a big risk as my hair used to be very oily and requires a shampoo daily or the oil starts to return.   I have left this on overnight and washed my hair in the morning for five days. I have noticed a huge increase in body, my hair feels healthy and strong from roots to tip, and my brunette hair has taken on a deeper, more powerful color tone. I am so impressed. I was so worried about greasiness using an oil but this has saved my hair. I hope it will also help grow new hairs but time will tell.   The scent is light, earthy, almost like almonds or other nuts.   I hope this review helps someone who is also hesitant about oiliness or has fine straight hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product did not help my hair, just made me more oily...

reviews.review_title: Where has this been all my life?!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To preface, I have thick corse curly hair that is drier than my social life this year! It has been bleached twice and dyed back to brown over the course of 10 months. I researched relentlessly on what might help and saw that a pre wash oil may do the trick. I found this on Sephora app and Iu2019m never going to look back! I use it twice a week when I wash, leaving it in for a few hours and washing and conditioning like normal. Wow! Itu2019s made such a difference! My hair is much smoother, feels healthier and when straightened it behaves much better!  The smell is nice, earthy and woody. I have hair to my mid back and use about 6 dropper amounts each time I use it, so it will last a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this, can tell a major difference in the texture of my hair. For reference, I was every 4-5 days and style most days with heat, my hair goes to my mid back and is color treated. Iu2019ve used this 4 times now and can most definitely feel the difference. My hair is softer, bouncier, and feels cleaner. In my opinion, there is not much of a scent, it is much different than the shampoo and conditioner. If anything, itu2019s a very faint, natural, earthy scent that washes right out, it does not linger.   I most definitely recommend this if youu2019re trying to get healthier hair, it really helped mine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for about a month now and I am obsessed. I definitely see a difference in my hair it feels healthier but I also see hair growth. I had a small bald spot on my left side and I no longer have it. I love the smell and how much a little goes a long way with this oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Agree with others. Does nothing.  Buy coconut and castor oil and peppermint and u will spend wayyy less and probably actually get results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Did absolutely nothing for my hair. Youu2019re better off buying a bottle of castor oil and rosemary oil mixing it, and putting it in your hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Feels nice on my roots and smells great! Love all of the Fable & Mane products I have tried.

reviews.review_title: Best wedding purchase I have made for myself
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to give this product for at least a month before I reviewed it but I didn't need to wait that long to see results! I have very fine thin hair and it's been getting worse for the last few years. My wedding is next year and I wanted to have some nice hair for it, so thought I would give this a shot. I was concerned there was so many review about a strong smell, I'm very sensitive to strong perfumes but I can use this no problem and love the scent! I use this once a week leaving it on overnight. I noticed withing 2-3 weeks my fly-a-way aren't as bad, my curls are more hydrated and come to life. I have been using it for almost a full month now and have noticed my hair to be a little denser than normal. a little goes a long way and have not made any noticeable dent on the bottle so definitely worth the price as it will last a long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a licensed hairstylist and I absolutely approve of this oil. I just love it! It has a really great lightweight consistency, smells incredible, and works easily through the hair and scalp. Iu2019ve been using it consistently as a pre-shampoo hair and scalp treatment and my hair and scalp have been very soft , moisturized and healthy as of late. The packaging is also adorable which is a plus. Really high quality product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this hair oil. This is so nice and feels so good on your hair. This is the first time Iu2019ve tried hair oil before washing. Love this concept and helped my hair feel really soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm new to hair oils and this was my first one I've ever tried. The first thing I noticed was the smell..it smells amazing and it lasts for a good while. I find using this weekly as I do a scalp massage has made my scalp so much happier. My scalp is less itchy and has much less build up. This is a keeper!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best oil treatment ever. Depending on your liking, it does have a really strong floral scent so just be aware of that. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_title: Best Hair Line for damaged hair and scalp
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time writing a review for Sephora. This is my favorite hair product along with the shampoo and conditioner. The oil helped my seborrheic dermatitis, I donu2019t have any flareups anymore and my fair feels like silk. I stopped using head and shoulders and Neutrogena T-gel since I think it made my hair fall out. Though my hair doesnu2019t feel squeaky clean after washing the oil out with the shampoo and conditioner I have the healthiest hair Iu2019ve ever had and itu2019s so shiny! The smell is heavenly too and my boyfriend enjoys using this line as much as I do :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product nightly to promote hair growth and I can't say enough good things. Not to mention, the product smells absolutely amazing. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this for doing scalp massages and strengthening hair before washing because I do think it helps, however, it doesnu2019t have a pleasant smell so I have to wash out quickly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try this because of the good reviews, but itu2019s a big no for me.   The scent is extremely over-bearing, kind of reminiscent of a great grandmas strong floral perfume.  After 30 minutes I had such a bad headache, that I had to wash it out.  Then I tried to use the hair mask from this same brand, which was also a mistake, that smell made me nauseous.  I had to re-wash my hair with Head and Shoulders and use my daughters strawberry scented detangler just to fully get rid of the smells.   Big waste of money, Iu2019m going to pass on all products from this brand.

reviews.review_text: I used this overnight and felt that was the most convenient and worthwhile way to use this productu2014 it sure isnu2019t cheap!! In addition, I have medium-long hair and felt that it required way more than the dropper sized amount recommended for use. For price purposes I will likely use once a week. In addition, because of the amount I used, not all of the oil came out in the first wash. From now on, after I use this product I will saturate my hair with conditioner (a large amount) before getting in the shower because this helps get the rest of the oil out and makes your hair even softer! I can see that it will help my hair and my baby hairs need to grow out!

reviews.review_text: This oil is very nice! It makes my hair smooth and shiny. I have long hair and it helps care for it. I would recommend to keep it on overnight and wash it off in the morning. It has a soft, nice, herbal scent as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I RECCOMEND. I LOVE THIS PRODUCT SO MUCH. It made my hair shiny and beautiful!

reviews.review_text: since my first application i love it. I really like that is not greasy and I can leave it over night for best results.

reviews.review_title: a great, lovely scented pre-shampoo oil

reviews.review_text: I love that this oil is meant as a pre-shampoo treatment. Some hair oils leave my long strands greasy, so leaving this in overnight for all the goodness to absorb and then wash out the rest really appeals to me. I also love the scent of this oil - very warm and pleasant. I found that I see most results with continued use of this oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wish I could give this product zero stars. The smell alone made me sick for hours! It dried out my scalp so bad it took weeks to recover from! Unfortunately I went out of town and missed the return window for this, so now I'm stuck with an overpriced bottle of perfumed crap. I'll be sad to throw all that money in the trash.

reviews.review_title: Best hair oil on the market!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I discovered Fable & Mane products earlier this year and have used their shampoo and conditioner duo religiously. I love hair oils and don't see them often in the market so I was really excited to try this out and I am so glad I did. First of all, it smells amazing. Secondly, it is so therapeutic and calming to apply this to my roots and I can truly feel it getting into my roots. I have noticed a significant difference in my hair since I've started using it. It feels stronger and I don't feel like it falls as much. The days I know I will be washing my hair, I will apply this first thing in the morning and let it sit in my scalp for as long as I can.  If you have never tried a pre-wash hair oil before, you are missing out. And if you have, then you NEED this! It is amazing stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Well like usual reviews on here are all Over the place and I didnu2019t know what to really take from them. First of all the scent is strong, it bothers me sometimes but I just do t leave it in for longer than a few hours before washing. Iu2019m a little jealous because the review said it made their hair soft and shiny and it didnu2019t for me . Maybe 30% shiner but nothing crazy, I wish it helped with my tangles, my ends still feel knotted and rough. HOWEVER I will keep this because it did basically clear my whole scalp and my flakes and itch  are completely gone!  Also I had a serious hair fall issue and I noticed after the SECOND time that my hair fall was really really minimal. Iu2019m just so happy to have my hair stop falling out that I will continue to use this. This has saved my hair and scalp!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: THIS PRODUCT IS MY HAIR SAVIOR! I plan on gifting to my friends and family for Christmas! Itu2019s made my hair more hydrated, softer and I swear it grown a lot since Iu2019ve used it. Highly recommend and it smells good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product.  I have had a lot of hair breakage and hair thinning.  This product has greatly improved my hair texture and fullness as well as breakage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this product 3 times now and I've definitely noticed improvement in the quality of my hair (i.e., softer, easier to manage). The bottle is small but a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_title: caused extreme itchy scalp and dandruff
