reviews.review_text: At first when I used this product I liked it. However, the second time I only left it on for a few minutes and after my hair dried it started to cause extreme itching and when I looked in the mirror there was dandruff which I've never had. It is not worth it! Please listen to the reviews! save yourself from a night of crazy itching and having to go buy dandruff shampoo!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product mainly because I wanted to improve my thinning hair. I've experienced significant hair fallout over the last year and have been looking for anything and everything to help. I've been using this regularly for about 2 months now. My hair is definitely shinier and healthier. My hair texture looks more wavy and less frizzy if I let it air dry. My hairdresser said she thought it looked thicker as well, but I will say it's not a dramatic difference. I unfortunately still have tons of fallout. However, because of how much healthier this has made my hair, I still think it's a great product and will continue using it. A little bit goes a long way. The scent seems to be pretty polarizing. It is a strong scent, but I personally think it smells amazing and luxurious. My overall takeaway is that this doesn't perform miracles but it will likely improve the health of your hair with regular use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: smells amazing, feels like heaven. when i washed my hair the next day it all came off. just loved it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a lot of scalp build up and a dry scalp, this helped so much. I use it once a week and my scalp has improved so much. Large areas that were bad are completely fixed. It does have a strong smell so people that donu2019t like that may need to find a different oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product and I LOVE the scent. Made my hair look extremely healthy and shiny, plus the hair loss I was experiencing has slowed down. I have medium-fine, wavy, long hair. Iu2019m buying this product did my grandmother who would definitely benefit from it, too. A must have for me

reviews.review_title: Love this ritual i feel divine and like a goddess
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am really loving this oil. I have used it every night overnight for the last two weeks. I gently massage it onto my scalp and let my ends soak it up. I have thinning hair with a bit of damage from highlighng. My ends are severly dry and this has been a god send. When i rinse my hair in the am its much softer and i can see this product making a difference in the textrue of my hair. I noticed some say they didnt like the fragrance but i love it and honestly wish it was stronger. It has a very light nutty fragrance reminds of a product i used years agao called ojon as far as smell goes. I truly enjoy this product and would like to see a more intense and larger version of this.

reviews.review_title: Where do I even begin with how bad this was
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My hair is my prized possession and I had very high hopes for this product, but I cannot lie this product is the most damaging thing I have EVER put in my hair.  I have a lot of hair, its thick, 2A and black. I do not have a sensitive scalp whatsoever, which is why I was so terrified and disturbed when (after leaving it in for the overnight treatment) I found my hair coming out in clumps in the shower. The problem did not stop there, my hair was dull and heavy so I washed it again, and while it fixed my hair, my scalp had dandruff and was incredibly itchy.  I tried again the following week, leaving it in for only one hour. This time it was better and I remained using it this way for about one week. When I stopped for a few days, my hair started to fall out double what it had ever fallen out IN MY LIFE.  This has never happened to me before. I have been doing olive oil, argan oil and rosehip oil treatments weekly for my hair since I was 14, so clearly oil is not my issue. My theory is that the fragrance (the THIRD ingredient by the way) is just as overwhelming to the scalp as it is to the nose.  To say I am upset is a massive understatement, I LOVE my hair more than anything and this has been extremely distressing, my scalp is still itchy and I am still losing more hair than ever before.  I know this product works well for a lot of people, but I felt like I just needed to share what an absolute mess this product was for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t believe the difference this has made in my hair health! I use a but more than recommended (a dropper and a half) and massage in with my fingers first, then a shampoo brush. I then leave the product overnight. I have hypothyroidism and this product was the only thing I changed in my regimen and my increase in shine and decrease in fallout has been noticeable. Yes, there is a floral fragrance, which is noticeable as long as the oil is in the hair. The results make this tolerable to me though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

Iu2019ve had it for less than a few days and in one try it made my hair feel silky and my ends looked so healthy (this coming from someone who frequently loves to balayage her hair). I generally feel I have good hair but I want something to make it thicker and healthier. If my first try is any indication Iu2019m going to be super pleased with the results. I will check in again in one month but I highly recommend this product. For me I use it as a treatment every other day (at least for the first month) and it stays on overnight. I use a cotton t shirt to keep my sheets clean and to add extra heat to my head.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t think it would work but after having my babies my hair by my temples was not growing back and what did grew back came back gray. Ugh..... After a few week I started to notice my hair getting thicker by my temples I also noticed I had less gray hair. I couldnu2019t believe it!  I will definitely continue to use this product. It also leaves your hair feeling so soft. I started to use it on my daughters hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Big fan of this stuff! Really love the scent - itu2019s not at all overpowering as some reviews suggest. I think itu2019s perfect and hope it doesnu2019t change. Iu2019ve noticed less breakage on my thin hair. I try to leave it overnight but if not, even just pre-shower works. Iu2019m going to try it as an oil as well by just using a really tiny amount. I definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing!  Helps you have healthy strong hair.  I leave it in overnight and the next day after shampooing it comes out beautiful.  Please do not pay attention to what the say about the smell.  Itu2019s so light and very pretty. Love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product but I think itu2019s a bit overpriced. I have highlighted hair( bleach about maybe 3 times a year) I put it over my roots and ends of my hair.  Massage through the scalp and leave it overnight. Wash it in the morning and my hair feels softer than usual. I donu2019t know how much product people are using but it doesnu2019t feel greasy or weight down my hair after washing. I have super long hair and I use about 12-15 tube( not that much since the tube doesnu2019t fill the entire thing each time) Iu2019m not so bother by the scent. To be honest I didnu2019t even notice before I read the reviews... Yes, there is a scent to it but I honestly donu2019t think itu2019s THAT strong? Over all I liked the product but feel there should be more product to it or some sort of value size for all the long hair girls.

reviews.review_title: My damage control and my hair remedy perfect
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best treatment that my very damaged and fine hair has been through, I have been unable to find my hairu2019s best match for a super long time. I love how these products can make your hair look its best and bring a perfect aroma to top it off. So happy and so grateful I was able to have help with my need for a great change. I feel so much more confident now that I have my own hair u201cmust have u201c

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve had this product for a month now, I recently had my hair dyed black to blonde twice causing a lot dryness and dead ends. Iu2019ve been doing the olaplex 3,4,5 treatments and after I come out the shower I brush my hair and put this oil on my hair, I actually just noticed it says pre-wash but it doesnu2019t  matter I guess lol oil is oil. I use this oil for rejuvenation purposes because my hair looked dead prior to that, and it works great for me so far, Iu2019ve noticed my hair is shinier, softer and the scent is amazing might not be for everyone but this is made with ethnic ingredients used mainly by south Asian women so the scent is ethic as well, I love it. Now with that said, you solely cannot depend on one product to do the magic which is why I mentioned the olaplex treatments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell of this product is so strong and overwhelming! I tried it once, but the horrible perfume scent made me feel so sick, I couldnu2019t stand it. I hoped it would dissipate after awhile, but it didnu2019t. Honestly, I donu2019t know what they were thinking with this fragrance. I really wanted to use this product because it seems like there are some good ingredients in there, but the fragrance just made it impossible so I had to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This makes my hair smooth, shiny, and greasy. The smell is sooo strong, I canu2019t stand it. Moroccan oil does the same thing but better because it doesnu2019t leaves hair heavy n greasy looking in the end. The deal breaker was the smell.

reviews.review_title: not for scent and skin sensitive
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product! I used it once and ended up returning it. Hair fallout is definitely less and that is noticeable after one use. The fragrance though is too strong for a hair product. It smells great but too much to the point it set off a headache for me. It lingered a really long time and this actually ended up drying out my scalp and I noticed I had dandruff a couple of days later. It also itched my scalp like crazy. Hopefully the company will recalibrate the fragrance somehow. I would rather smell the earthiness of the ingredients they used. Packaging is very pretty and I love the story behind the brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this so far. Iu2019ve used it twice so canu2019t really comment on the long term effects (why Iu2019m only giving it 4 stars) but so far my hair is shinier, softer and overall just looks a lot better. Would definitely repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like since I started using this I have noticed a decrease in dandruff. I am a once to twice a week hair washer and I get a lot of build up so I usually have it in a bun by day 3 but now it can leave it down more and not have my shoulders look like snow capped mountain tops. Also the smell is great.. it's so earthy smelling..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Much like another reviewer, I had high hopes for this hair oil. It's been about a week of using it (4 times in one week) and I see nothing special about this oil. First, the fragrance, while nice, is strong for my taste. Second, in order to massage it into my whole scalp and run it lightly through the length of my hair, took over 4 full stoppers of the oil. That being said, this bottle will be empty very soon. Does it make my hair feel soft? Sure, but so does good ole Extra Virgin Olive Oil.  Economically, this is NOT a good value. For less than 2 ounces, you're paying over $30 with tax/shipping which is way too much. If it were a larger bottle, then I would say for sure it was worth the money. I go to India often and I feel like over there, I could pick up a bottle of similar oils blended together for less than $5 and in a much larger size.  It's too bad, because I really wanted to like this, but it's just a mediocre, overpriced product.

reviews.review_title: Love the oil, hate the scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this makes my hair feel, instantly after using hair is soft and more tame looking. However, the scent gives me such a bad headache, I wouldn't get this if you are sensitive to scents. It's so strong it's borderline offensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so incredible and leaves hair mega soft- I love this product so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes from this hair oil; however, I havent seen any difference in my hair. The fragrance is way to strong for me..always leave me with a headache.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this hair oil. It changes the look and feel of my hair when it is on and after I wash and condition (love the f & m shampoo and conditioner too). Soft yet strong. The smell is amazing!

Love this hair oil!! Itu2019s not thick and gross feeling which I love and it gets the job done. I personally love strong smelling hair products but I can understand how itu2019s not everyoneu2019s cup of tea. For reference it smells a lot like Gucci bloom !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: so i wasnu2019t sure that i believed this would soften my hair after I washed it and it did! I have long hair, which is bleached, and I normally do coconut oil masks before I shower. I added this to my roots and the coconut oil to the shafts, and my hair turned out sooo soft and healthy looking! way healthier and soft than with just the coconut oil. iu2019m south asian and love clean products, so I definitely hit the jackpot with this. iu2019m not sure why there are complaints on the fragranceu2014 wasnu2019t that strong and not that noticeable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great stuff.  Really helps with improving how my scalp feels.  I do think it thickens too, but I already have thick hair, so it's difficult to judge.  Would defin buy again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this hair oil so much! It leaves my hair super shiny and feeling strong when I wash it out! the only reason I give this 4 stars is because the scent is too strong for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had never used an oil that goes on before your shower but I love this! I feel like I am finally treating my hair right with Fable and Mane!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Coming from an Indian/Pakistani backcground, pre-wash hair oils are a common thing but I always hated how heavy those oils would feel. THIS is the solution to that. It's so lightweght and I love how little I need for it to work. I tested it out with various shampoos outside the Fable & Mane line and this has kept my hair so soft and smooth. Would forever repurchase this pre-wash oil

reviews.review_title: Smells like luxury feels like luxury!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This will have to be my favorite pre-wash hair oil to date. My roots never felt healthier and stronger!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time using a pre-wash oil treatment. I now love adding this onto my self-care routine: massaging the oil into my scalp never felt so good. My scalp felt protected after washing and my long hair felt super smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Seriously love this product! I've only been using it a couple of weeks now and my hair is so soft from root to tip. Plus the smell is great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Has a strong scent that might not be for others but I love it! Applied it to my scalp and hair before braiding and sleeping on a towel overnight. Washes out fairly easily and leaves your hair really soft and your scalp feeling refreshed. Also works great as a leave-in oil if my ends are dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like how this keeps my scalp nourished and free from irritation before washes! But the application and overall fragrance is overpowering for me at times so I tend to reach for this less often in comparison to the rest of their line

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is incredible. It has truly changed the way my hair feels and looks. It makes it so much more softer and shinier. Perfect for scalp massages!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've only used it once, but my hair does feel silkier the next day. I kept it on for hours, not only for the benefits, but because the scent is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve only been using for a week - so I canu2019t speak to long term results - but my hair feels a lot healthier as well as my scalp feels nourished and hasnu2019t been itchy. I have a dry scalp and normally Iu2019m scratching it quite frequently. I havenu2019t been since using this.   I put it on and leave it overnight and sometimes all day and over night. I especially love sleeping with it in because of the calming scent.   Iu2019ve used castor oil quite frequently on my hair but Iu2019ve never experienced results like this. I also use leave in conditioner as a gel to slick back my hair almost everyday and I still had a dry scalp until I used this.   Iu2019m beyond happy. I will be using this forever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing lightweight hair oil that leaves my hair feeling so well nourished, healthy, and soft. I'm not a huge fan of the scent so I don't like to leave it on overnight but it works just as well when I leave it on for about 5 minutes prior to washing.

reviews.review_title: WORKS WONDERS FOR FINE, STRAIGHT HAIR!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was SHOCKED at how much I love this. I have long, fine, straight, blonde hair, the kind of hair that gets greasy after one day. I also put my hair through a lot - daily gym sweat, washing frequently, dry shampoo, summer lightening sprays, and I'm a first responder so it's always tied up and in a helmet. I use this as a weekly treatment on days off or if I take a bath, and leave it in my hair for honestly like two hours. Sometimes more. You will look and feel like a greased chicken while it's in, and I find the scent really pleasant and warm. But after you wash, oh LORD, it's night and day. I use a purple shampoo (which can be drying) and follow with their conditioner too. My hair is SO soft, shining and absolutely radiant when I emerge from my scalding hot shower. I don't know if it really strengthen's, but it's like my split ends disappear after I use this stuff. New holy grail for sure.

reviews.review_title: please make this scent into a perfume
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: While I cannot speak to the long-term effects of this product, I can say that it is an incredibly lightweight yet nourishing oil. Please do yourself a favour and leave it in overnight - 5 minutes would be such a waste! The product is expensive so I want to be sure Iu2019m getting the maximum benefits out of it. The scent is incredible and my hair feels so healthy after I use it. There is a noticeable difference in shine and a reduction in frizz. Iu2019m giving it 4 stars simply because I have not been using it long enough to speak to the larger claims, such as increased hair growth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have very fine, curly hair, and I suffer from a lot of hair loss during the summer months so I was desperate to find something that may help. I've been using this for a month now and there has been a reduction in hair loss. No hair growth yet, but that usually takes time. it smells so nice too, I'm not embarrassed to run errands after applying the oil, as it has a fresh scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So first off- My hair is very long, with the unintentional 2020 ombre. I swim pretty much every day and I hit the point where my hair was super dry and starting to break at the ends. The first night I used a full dropper worth of product working from my root to my tip, then I put my hair in a bun with a silk scrunchy. In the morning I washed it out with a mild shampoo and before I even put the conditioner on I could feel the difference. I love this product because unlike a lot of other oils, when you wash it out, its light enough to not leave any residue only a healthy shine. I also use a VERY small amount before I blow-dry and curl my hair, its so smooth with no frizz and doesnt feel weighed down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this oil is everything! itu2019s a treatment. itu2019s a hair oil. tames frizz, nourishes, repairs damage. it smells INSANELY amazing. itu2019s just a great products. 10/10. I have curly and thick hair for reference.

Absolutely love this stuff! The scent is strong but personally I love it! I would use this stuff just for the scent. I know this says itu2019s a pre wash oil but I use it pre and post wash. Itu2019s hydrating and helps with the frizzy bits of hair I get. Definitely would recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Every time I use this my hair looks super healthy in the following days. The smell is increddddible... Might not be for everyone but I canu2019t get enough. Hoping that this will promote a bit of hair growth but too soon to tell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hooray for clean brands but not a fan of the scent.   Love the oil but not the scent.  If you are scent sensitive then you may want to avoid this product.  I was excited to get this but will have to return due to the smell.  Light not heavy oil. Great packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good concept horrible smell! Used twice and returned

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Firstly, it smells great. Secondly its not greasy and it works. Definitely helps with hair fall and helps strengthen your hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing! Iu2019ve been using this consistently for 2 weeks and Iu2019ve experienced less irritation in my scalp and less hair fall out! The oil itself is super lightweight and it also smells incredible which is always a plus u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. Magic in a bottle! Ihave a ton of unruly  baby hairs and frizz and after using this once a week for three weeks, my hair looks like I just had done a Keratin treatment. I have super fine hair and I was afraid the oil would make my hair oily and that I would have to wash it more often. The opposite happened. I can go without washing my hair for up to five days and my hair looks great. I leave the treatment overnight and My scalp feels clean and energized :)) oh, and it smells sooo good!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: my hair is thinning on the top and it seems like this makes my hair thicker.  I don't know why you have to rinse it out and then shampoo. that's a little weird   my hair is really dry now and I don't know if it is because of this oil.  its a wait and see after using it more

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves behind a lovely scent and definitely helps to moisturize and calm, fried/dry hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this product every other week for 3 months now. The first time I used this product, I did the recommended overnight treatment. Although it made my hair shine beautifully, it also gave me the worst migraine from the strong smell. The fragrance is really overwhelming and if you are sensitive to strong smells I do not recommend. I still put this on for about 10 min before I wash my hair but the shine really only lasts for half a day and have not seen any improvement in volume or growth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would give it zero stars if I could. The fragrance in here is strong. It smells more like perfume than an oil you would put on your scalp. My scalp broke out afterwards and is still recovering from it

reviews.review_title: 2 and a half month use of this oil
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay Iu2019ve been using this in my hair routine for almost 2 and a half months and Iu2019ve noticed a difference in my hair. I struggle with frizzy and dry hair due to bleaching and years of using bad drug store shampoos. I bought this and the shampoo and conditioner line and my hair has changed a lot. Itu2019s gotten healthier for sure. My hair is soft, shiny and the frizziness has reduced A LOT. I havenu2019t used hair spray in awhile to tame my frizz. On top of that my hair grew like crazy. I use this oil as an overnight hair mask mixed with my other oils and then I wash it out the next day. Also the smell is Fab. Smells like luxurious perfume so if you donu2019t mind fragrants then I recommend this! I also like to put this oil on my ends everyday and because it gives a gorgeous shine to it :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish this came in an unscented version!  I am scent sensitive, and while this is not the strongest smelling product I have used, it definitely has a firm scent.  The strength of the scent did not dissipate at all for me.  I did the overnight method, and my scalp hair does feel smoother and my scalp feels cleaner after just one use.  I estimate I could get at least 6 uses, maybe more if I was careful out of this bottle, but it is being gifted to my friend who I know will love the scent. Please make an unscented version!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using pre-wash hair oil for as long as I can remember but this is one is my personal favorite! it is amazing for your roots to stimulate hair growth while also making your hair super soft. After rinsing, it leaves my hair very soft and silky. Lastly. I just adore the smell of fable and Mane which is a major plus for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: idk why everyone is saying it smells so bad and it's so fragrant lol, it hardly smells like anything and is actually really pleasant. makes my hair smooth, shiny, and less frizzy. havent been using it long enough to see more benefits but overall great so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this three times, and have been so impressed each time. I massage into scalp at night, leave on overnight and wash hair in the morning. I was freaked out about sleeping with an oil in my hair, worried it would break me out, but the oil absorbs well and I have had no skin issues whatsoever. After washing and drying my hair, it feels fuller, cleaner, and healthier! And the smell is divine, so luxurious. I am so glad I tried this product, Iu2019m now hooked! I have fine, colour treated 2B curls

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sooooo dang good! The smell is strong, but I enjoy the jasmine! It nourishes, hydrates, and promotes a beautiful blow out!!!!!! Only a little on your scalp is needed. I follow with a scalp brush for extra stimulation, then I sleep in it and shampoo/condish in the morning! You will LOVE the results! And Iu2019ve used it 1x/week for the last 3 weeks. Highly recommend!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this!! My hair is fuller since using thus oil and my hair is growing faster since I started using this product. I do not notice any more dry scalp or irritated scalp since using this product.  I always place it on my scalp and work excess through my hair the night before I shampoo my hair. I will be repurchasing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this based on the companyu2019s profile and the story, then the ingredients in this. But I am disappointed that I donu2019t see any improvement or changes in my hair. Just a regular scalp oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t say enough about this stuff as I was pleasantly surprised by the effectiveness. My hair is usually very thick and full but lately Iu2019ve been on a new medication and unfortunately one of the side effects can be hair loss. Iu2019d say when I bought this oil I was at about 50% of my normal hair volume. I bought this oil thinking if it helped great, donu2019t expect miracles, at the very least Iu2019d have extremely soft hair.  All of that being said, after 2-3 weeks of daily (or almost daily) use I can definitely feel and see a difference in the volume of my hair; maybe 70% now? I donu2019t mind the smell, which is quite floral, but not overpowering in my opinion. The oil itself is very light and I find it doesnu2019t weigh my hair down. Iu2019ve even applied a couple days in a row (no wash between) and found my hair still didnu2019t look greasy. And it does help make my hair quite soft.   So Iu2019d say it was definitely worth the shot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great hair oil, I absolutely love using it. However I prefer to use it through out the day for a couple of hours, because I find using it overnight, the scent can be a little bit too overwhelming for me. I really saw a difference in my hair after using it, my hair looks so much healthier, it's shiny and super soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve only been using this line a few weeks and I already see a difference. Im not a huge fan of how it makes my hair feel but it definitely looks fuller and thicker. Other shampoo/conditioners leave my hair feeling more manageable and looking softer but nothing Iu2019ve tried has ever has made my hair look this full. I can get the other desired results with products but never a fullness that looks natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff smells SO good I almost want to just use it on my entire body. I haven't noticed a difference in the thickness of my hair yet, but it already feels so much softer and appears so shiny.
